title: android weex-sdk0.18.0  input输入框无法清空
body:
android手机 使用weex-sdk0.18.0 库   input无法达到清空的效果 例子如下：
      <input class="password_ip" ref="input1"  :value="textinput"  @input="getConfrimPassword"  />
  getConfrimPassword(event) 
{ this.textinput = event.value;
 }，
login() {
     this.textinput = "";
    }
每次执行login方法 只有第一次能清成功，其他时候都无法清除。  但是android playground每次都能成功

new Date().toLocaleDateString() bug?
body:
for example: today is 08/03/2018；
in a IOS weex-platform: new Date().toLocaleDateString()  > 2018/8/3
but in a android weex-platform: new Date().toLocaleDateString() > 2018/8/2
in a h5-platform, no matter in a IOS or Android platform: new Date().toLocaleDateString() > 2018/8/3

title: WeexSDK.podspec contains a part of headers
body:
I see the podspec in [Specs](https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs/blob/master/Specs/7/2/9/WeexSDK/0.18.0.2/WeexSDK.podspec.json) is different from [incubator-weex.](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/master/WeexSDK.podspec)
Specs has public_header_files, which is not enough to use for second dev.

title: NA
body: @myeveryheart do you mean that any implements you need are not in the public_header_files yet? Can you describe it in more detail? Thanks.

title: NA
body: @xuyouyang Yes, you are right. Cocoapods can create public headers If no public headers are specified then all the headers in source_files are considered public. That would be better.

title: NA
body: @myeveryheart I am sorry that I maybe not agree with you. In my opinions, a SDK framework do not need to public every file, such as some inner utility files. If you want to use or add more implements, you can add 'Category' files in your own project. Furthermore, you can import Weex source code to your project and public anything you want through local pod.

title: Weex failed to render in Fragment (Android)
body:
Hello, i try to render weex with Fragment (Android) but failed with error as below:

`08-13 12:16:36.360 20983-21003 E/weex: reportJSException >>>> 
instanceId:1, exception function:createInstance, exception:Exception: 
SyntaxError: Unexpected token '}'. Cannot parse statement.`

And i already tried this [ISSUE from alibaba-weex](https://github.com/alibaba/weex/issues/2593)
 My issue already posted in StackOverFlow,[Weex can not render in Fragment (Android)](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51815239/weex-can-not-render-in-fragment-android).
Help

title: NA
body: The `SyntaxError: Unexpected token '}'` is quite a common error when parsing or executing incomplete js code. Maybe the js bundle of your page is not fully downloaded before rendering.

title: NA
body:
Dear Hanks,finally i make it to render weex page in Android Fragment.

The **mistake** is i used wrong method  to load the url ~~`mWXSDKInstance.render()`~~ instead of the correct ` mWXSDKInstance.renderByUrl()` 

And for the sample to render with Fragment  try this[weex-start-kit](https://github.com/w11p3333/weex-start-kit).

Thanks for your help :)

title: [devtool] Automate the beta version sign-off and publish process
body:
According to the branch management principles, we are trying to establish a beta branch to track the weekly release of the project. So we need to automate the branch-off and publish procedures to manage the branches, tags and release automatically.

A script for sign-off and publish beta release is needed, which provides automated version number detection, auto merge beta release branch into the beta branch and sign-off, and rebase the beta changes back to the master branch.

title: NA
body:
It is because of the browser's same-origin policy.
1. There is a js error `Uncaught ReferenceError: url is not defined` in your demo, I fixed it and you will see another error from `<web>` component: `Blocked a frame with origin "http://dotwe.org" from accessing a cross-origin frame.` Demo: http://dotwe.org/vue/ad4d6d4a11e407cdcb24167c2b9da828
2. I changed your url to same origin of dotwe.org, and it works. Demo: http://dotwe.org/vue/7846a576c0150aa52de6ad2caf283c00

title: NA
ios ModalUI显示相关问题
body:
## Description

使用weex sdk 0.18.0发现 ‘modal.toast({ message: '123'})'显示不了
查看modalUIModule源码，发现model父view使用的不是keyWindow:
```
    UIView *superView =  [[[UIApplication sharedApplication] windows] objectAtIndex:0];
```
正好我的App有多个window，第一个window为hidden，故显示不了。

weex sdk更新到最新版本发现此处已经修改，并能正确显示’modal.toast‘窗口了。
```
    UIView *superView = self.weexInstance.rootView.window;
    if (!superView) {
        superView =  self.weexInstance.rootView;
    }
```

但是在 `- (UIView *)toastViewForMessage:(NSString *)message superView:(UIView *)superView` 中，
仍然又出现了：`UIWindow *window = [[[UIApplication sharedApplication] windows] objectAtIndex:0];`
既然有superView了，就可以用superView了，这里应该去掉！！！


另：
又往下面看了几行，发现switch中，每个分支都有：
```
    point = CGPointMake(window.frame.size.width/2, window.frame.size.height/2);
```
这也太不走心了，明显应该提出去的代码写进switch。。。。。。


还有weex sdk中 ’WXModuleCallback‘既然已经标识为deprecated，推荐使用’WXModuleKeepAliveCallback‘，为什么还不将所有WXModuleCallback替换掉？
搞得一堆warnning~~~用起来不爽啊~~~

## Environment

ios weex sdk 0.18.0

NA
body: @fishyumiao '_adjustContentOffsetIfNecessary' is a private method in UIScrollerView .I think you'd better learn more about this.

title: NA
body:
@xuyouyang I know this. I don't understand why you split the method name into "a" & "b", then combine them together. It's necessary? Why not use the `_adjustContentOffsetIfNecessary` directly? It just a string. 
Or you think Apple will not know a private method swizzling if you split the method name string?

title: NA
body: @fishyumiao Yes, it is an easy and effective way to reduce the risk of APP review.

title: NA
body: @fishyumiao Thank you very much for finding some 'bad smells' in Weex code. You can try to commit 'PR' to fix them.

title: using unregistered weex module "swipeBack"
body:
## Description

页面能够正常显示，但日志中说使用了没注册的module，工程中没有出现任何包含"swipeBack"的内容

日志：
```
<Weex>[warn]WXJSCoreBridge.m:146, jsLog: [JS Framework] using unregistered weex module "swipeBack"
```
不知道是什么原因造成的？
怎么解决？

## Environment

ios weex sdk 0.18.0.3

title: NA
body:
我是自己写了一个，里面的实现是空的
Weex 编译js的时候会自动添加一个
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8416556/44952343-dc19fa80-aeaf-11e8-9723-b932a2d9a5b7.png)

---
IOS

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8416556/44952350-171c2e00-aeb0-11e8-88db-ccfb309a38b9.png)

# 但是只是解决不报错

title: NA
body: 一般报 `using unregister weex module` 是因为用了没注册的原生模块。按照文档[自定义模块](http://weex-project.io/cn/guide/extend-ios.html#zi-ding-yi-module)里的介绍，除了写一份模块实现以外，还要在初始化好 Weex SDK 之后注册一下自定义的模块，这样页面里才能调用得到。

body: 你提供的例子我试了一下可以打开 bilibili 的网站，播放不了视频是因为视频链接是 `bilibili:video/xxxxx`， Weex 容器并不识别这种 schema，看起来不像 `<web>` 组件的问题，是 B 站不认识 Weex 容器。建议使用纯净的例子，不要包含这些网站。

title: JS Service无法调用
body:
按照[官方文档](http://weex.apache.org/cn/references/js-service.html)编写了一个：[KSService.js](http://test-1252137158.file.myqcloud.com/myFloder/KSService.js)

原生中也注册了这个service，但是在vue中调用没有反应，是否因为文档中这个JS Service的编写例子不是完整的？

title: NA
body:
The first argument of `service.register` (`options.KSService` in your example) should be the same string with what native registered. The document assumed the `options` variable is passed form native, it's unnecessary for js service. We'll revise it later.

> `service.register` 的第一个参数应该和 native 注册名称一样的字符串，文档例子里假设客户端已经把 options 变量传过去了（有助于确保注册名一致），其实不是必须的，稍后文档里改掉。

title: NA
body:

>

title: Xcode10 不再默认支持stdc++
body:
Xcode 10 不在默认支持stdc++, 在WeexSDK.podspec中对stdc++ 改为 c++吧，不然编译会失败

s.libraries = "stdc++"

to

s.libraries = "c++"

title: picker is undefined !
body:
## Description
I try to import the picker module like this : 
const picker = weex.requireModule('picker')
But when I tried to call it, like in the exemple 
https://weex.apache.org/references/modules/picker.html

Nothing happend. So I put a console.log(picker) to see what inside. 
But it return undefined
Then I tries to search in the source code. 
I found this : 

requireModule (moduleName) {
    const metaMod = weex._meta.requiredModules
    if (!metaMod[moduleName]) {
      metaMod[moduleName] = 0
    }
    metaMod[moduleName]++
    return weexModules[moduleName]
  },

 weexModules['picker'] is undefined and weexModules list havent 'picker'. 

Can you help me ?

## Environment

"dependencies": {
    "phantom-limb": "0.0.1",
    "vue": "^2.5.11",
    "vue-router": "^3.0.1",
    "vuex": "^3.0.1",
    "weex-vue-render": "^1.0.17",
    "weex-vuex-loader": "^1.0.0"
  },

I run on the web weex playground in chrome

title: NA
body:
The `weex-picker` has been moved out of the `weex-vue-render` package. Here is the source code, you can import manually. https://github.com/weexteam/weex-picker

By the way, I think the picker module should be put back to the `weex-vue-render` package. Maybe @imyzf can help with this.

title: NA
body: I will close this PR as it seems resolved, feel free to reopen if there is still a problem.

title: android接入weex,在二级页面无法从js端调用native方法
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Please follow the [Bug Report Guidelines](http://weex-project.io/bug-report-guidelines.html) to file issues. A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!--
感谢使用 Weex。请遵照 [Bug 报告指南](http://weex-project.io/cn/bug-report-guidelines.html) 创建 issue，希望你可以提供如下信息：
-->

## Description
前置条件:
* Application中执行了**WXSDKEngine.initialize**的初始化调用,并且注册了自定义的Module类
* js端通过let module_xx = weex.requireModule('module-name')引入模块
* js端通过module_xx调用由@JSMethod注解的方法

现在的问题是:
* 如果渲染的是一级页面,module能正常调用到native方法;如果是二级页面, module_xx在前端打印的是undefined
* 场景Page1 通过navigator.push启动到Page2. Page2 调用不到native方法,Page1 中是正常的
* 但在Page2中,引入内置模块,调用正常.如modal可以正常toast,navigator可以正常切换页面
* Page2中在 js端,取到的module_xx对象是undefined

<!-- The brief description of the potential bug. -->

## Environment
gradle的依赖配置如下

```gradle
//weex相关的版本,已经修改到较新的版本,老版本同样存在上面描述的问题
compile 'com.taobao.android:weex_sdk:0.18.0'
compile 'com.taobao.android:weex_inspector:0.16.20'
provided 'org.weex.plugin:processor:1.0.2'
```

title: NA
body:
看一下文档中 [通用事件](http://weex-project.io/cn/wiki/common-events.html) 的 Page 事件。摘录如下：

> viewappear 和 viewdisappear 事件关注的是整个页面的状态，所以它们必须绑定到页面的根元素上。
> 特殊情况下，这两个事件也能被绑定到非根元素的body组件上，例如wxc-navpage组件

title: android使用源码导入工程失败，界面显示 reader error -1001 degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1
body:
# 我使用weex 中文文档上写的源码方式导入现有的Android工程
## 导入步骤：
 - 下载源码 git clone https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex.git
 -  创建 Android 工程。
 -  通过以下路径引入 SDK Module
 -  File->New-Import Module-> 选择 WEEX SDK Module(weex/android/sdk) -> Finish
 -  app 的 build.gradle 中添加如下依赖:compile project(':sdk')
导入之后编译报错找不到  **path '../../weex_core/CMakeLists.txt'** 然后我把weex_core源码也导入了，编译继续报错，切换了NDK 14之后可以编译了。有几个小冲突，是因为recyleview缺少了。继续导入。最后成功编译了。但是打开页面。不是报错 reader error -1001，就是不显示页面。

**PS:文档真的和实际很不一样，怎么才能正确的用源码方式开发？**


log日志：

```

09-28 23:34:32.983 12385-12438/com.xxx.myapplication E/WeexCore: failed find class WMBridge
09-28 23:34:32.983 12385-12438/com.xxx.myapplication W/System.err: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Didn't find class "com.taobao.windmill.bridge.WMLBridge" on path: DexPathList[[zip file "/data/app/com.xxx.myapplication-2/base.apk"],nativeLibraryDirectories=[/data/app/com.xxx.myapplication-2/lib/arm, /data/app/com.xxx.myapplication-2/base.apk!/lib/armeabi-v7a, /vendor/lib, /system/lib]]
09-28 23:34:32.984 12385-12438/com.xxx.myapplication W/System.err:     at dalvik.system.BaseDexClassLoader.findClass(BaseDexClassLoader.java:56)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:511)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:469)
        at java.lang.Runtime.nativeLoad(Native Method)
        at java.lang.Runtime.doLoad(Runtime.java:435)
        at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary(Runtime.java:370)
        at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:1076)
        at com.taobao.weex.utils.WXSoInstallMgrSdk.initSo(WXSoInstallMgrSdk.java:140)
        at com.taobao.weex.WXSDKEngine$1.run(WXSDKEngine.java:226)
        at com.taobao.weex.common.WXThread$SafeRunnable.run(WXThread.java:48)
        at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:815)
        at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:104)
        at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:207)
        at android.os.HandlerThread.run(HandlerThread.java:61)
    	Suppressed: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.taobao.windmill.bridge.WMLBridge
        at java.lang.Class.classForName(Native Method)
        at java.lang.BootClassLoader.findClass(ClassLoader.java:781)
        at java.lang.BootClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:841)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:504)
    		... 12 more
    	Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Class not found using the boot class loader; no stack trace available

```

补充说明 ：一开始使用     
```
mInstance.renderByUrl(
        getPageName(),
        url,
        options,
        jsonInitData,
        CommonUtils.getDisplayWidth(this),
        CommonUtils.getDisplayHeight(this),
        WXRenderStrategy.APPEND_ASYNC); 
```
打开会显示-1001，现在换了一种打开方式之后‘mWXSDKInstance.render("WXSample", WXFileUtils.loadFileOrAsset("index.js", this), null, null, -1, -1, WXRenderStrategy.APPEND_ASYNC);’，weex页面安装的第一次是空白的，返回但桌面，再次打开，就可以显示页面了。

- 2018-09-29更新，使用了0.16.0版本之后没遇到这个问题了。最新版本的bug吗？

body:

compile 'com.taobao.android:weex_sdk:0.19.0.3'

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12876555/47893568-7f7b9180-de98-11e8-8454-b3d5dfc68830.png)

title: NA
body: @fantasysea 这个问题解决了吗？同样遇到这个问题

title: NA
body:
这个问题原因是你直接引入此库中的android-sdk源码，其中的build.gradle中有三行
`    delete 'libs/armeabi/libweexcore.so'
    delete 'libs/armeabi-v7a/libweexcore.so'
    delete 'libs/x86/libweexcore.so'`
已经将libweexcore.so 给删了，而后是通过直接编译出新的so。图简单的话，可以直接在[此路径中](https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=incubator-weex.git;a=tree;f=android/sdk/libs;h=b32a7a5dbb58048c5d6d22785fdc06260d984537;hb=HEAD)将最近的匹配平台的so下载下来引入，并且注释上述三行代码，避免再次被删除

title: NA
body:
> @fantasysea 这个问题解决了吗？同样遇到这个问题

gradle的配置发一下看看

title: NA
body:
@fantasticcmm @ttarigo 尝试修改下gradle中的配置路径，sdk需要从weex的根目录拷贝so和js文件。
直接import，配置相对路径文件各种找不到
- 第一步，声明weex的根目录 `String weexRootPath = '/Users/xxx/xxx/incubator-weex"`
- 第二步，修改相对路径
   - `'../../pre-build'`改为`weexRootPath+'/pre-build'`
   - `'../../weex_core/CMakeLists'`改为`weexRootPath+'/weex_core/CMakeLists.txt'`
   - `dir:"../../weex_core"`改为`dir:weexRootPath+"/weex_core"`

title: NA
body: 这边终于解决了这个问题，根据以上几位的指点，发现可能是因为gradle插件版本不一致的问题，导致项目中生成的libweexcore.so的目录路径跟weex源码库中weex_core下release.sh或debug.sh脚本中的路径不一样，所以执行sh脚本时copy文件失败，但不会报任何异常，我这边的处理方式是在写一个task任务来自己copy so文件到libs下，避免直接修改源码，导致后续升级sdk困难

title: NA
body:
使用最新的版本通过gradle接入，还是有偶现的该问题出现。
现在想确定一下如果初始化失败，之后再进行初始化，会不会一直失败。

title: NA
body:
> 初始化失败，之后再进行初始化，会不会一直

应该是 weex 还没初始化完，onException 里延时重试  render 可以解决，亲测有效

title: NA
body:
你好，我这边也出现了该问题的，我看了一下，具体的报错是**lib*****.so” is 32-bit instead of 64-bit**；现在weex提供了armeabi 和armeabi-v7a两种架构的so包，但是没有提供arm64-v8a架构的so包，导致初始化失败。建议官方生成arm64-v8a架构的so包，供开发人员自主选择。使用的weex版本是0.20.3.0-beta
@Hanks10100

title: NA
NA
body:
> 项目本身有一个so库，但是没有过滤ABI，默认生成了全部ABI对应的so库。观察apk中lib目录，发现只有x86、armeabi、armeabi-v7a中有对应的weex so库，于是过滤ABI后，问题解决。
> 
> `ndk { abiFilters "armeabi", "armeabi-v7a", "x86" }`

亲测对我有效。3Q

title: are there some methods to prevent <cell> support RecyclerView?
body: always, this feature is useful, however, sometimes it makes some difficulties. For example, if one `<cell>` has more than 30 images (or other things be added by ajax), it may be rerendered when it reenters to visual area, then it will make the page be blocked in a short time.

title: NA
body:
you can use recycle="false" in cell to prevent the Image And Text Data ReBind。

https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex-site/pull/310/files

Or you can  use  autoBitmapRecycle="false" in image to prevent the bitmap to be recycle when not visible.

title: NA
body:
> you can use recycle="false" in cell to prevent the Image And Text Data ReBind。
> 
> https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex-site/pull/310/files
> 
> Or you can use autoBitmapRecycle="false" in image to prevent the bitmap to be recycle when not visible.

let me try~

title: NA
body: 先将webview高度设置为1，pageFinish时再重新设置页面高度可解决此问题

title: NA
body:
> 先将webview高度设置为1，pageFinish时再重新设置页面高度可解决此问题

pageFinish是等待所有数据加载完之后（包括图片、资源等），这样会导致页面一直高度为1，直到所有资源加载完之后用户才能看到。这样体验很差啊 @liuruizhe728

问题1

问题2
我用andriod studio导入了platforms/android

但是一直报错，见截图和gist 

https://gist.github.com/xpurer/6f61354366d54a8329c1774b04267cfb

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12876555/47351534-c1fbdc00-d6ea-11e8-9661-c513d14019e5.png)

title: NA
body:
搞定，是我代理设置的问题。
默认生成的配置有2个小问题，解决方案分别如下。

1.
java - Could not find aapt2-proto.jar - Stack Overflow: http://t.cn/EZh1xON

2.
https://blog.csdn.net/u014300915/article/details/78355420

更新Android Studio 3.0之后，出现Cannot set the value of read-only property ‘outputFile’报错，也就是用来打包后重命名的gradle出现了问题

旧版本
AS 2.3时用的代码：
```

applicationVariants.all { variant ->
        variant.outputs.each { output ->
            def outputFile = output.outputFile
            if (outputFile != null && outputFile.name.endsWith('.apk')) {
                def fileName = "driver_${variant.productFlavors[0].name}_v${defaultConfig.versionName}.apk"
                output.outputFile = new File(outputFile.parent, fileName)
            }
        }
    }

```
修改之后：```

    flavorDimensions 'api'
    productFlavors {
        ...
    }
    android.applicationVariants.all { variant ->
        variant.outputs.all {
            outputFileName = "driver_${variant.productFlavors[0].name}_v${variant.versionName}.apk"
        }
    }

```

title: 奇怪，为什么安卓上，下面这个color不能覆盖上面的color ；css优先级是怎样的？
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12876555/47690969-3b378980-dc2b-11e8-8154-ae770d2d56ca.png)

见截图

title: NA
body:
目前 Weex 里的 CSS 还没有实现“优先级”的功能，最终是转换成 JSON 格式的结构交给客户端处理的，某些行为可能和浏览器不一样。 
后续会考虑实现一部分 CSSOM 的能力，到时候能够支持最基本的选择器，也会有优先级的概念。

title: Gesture event get different value in iOS & Android.
NA
body:
The doc for  [touch.PageX](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Touch/pageX) shows, pageX :   A long representing the X coordinate of the touch point relative to the viewport, including any scroll offset.

scroll Offset should be taken into consideration, the same as [touch.PageY](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Touch/pageY)

title: NA
body:
Well, i think so.  but `weexInstance.rootView` and `scroller view` are not the same view for iOS,  there is no scroll offset in touch.pageY  calculation.

Android  set scrollX & scrollY offset  by `locEventOffset.offset(locLeftTop.x, locLeftTop.y)`. There is no similar code in iOS

title: NA
body: fixed, https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/2113

`cd awesome-app`
`npm install`
`weex platform add ios`

title: weex页面在客户端上的刷新问题
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Please follow the [Bug Report Guidelines](http://weex-project.io/bug-report-guidelines.html) to file issues. A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!--
感谢使用 Weex。请遵照 [Bug 报告指南](http://weex-project.io/cn/bug-report-guidelines.html) 创建 issue，希望你可以提供如下信息：
-->

## Description

在使用命令 `npm run dev & npm run serve` 后，保存vue文件，网页里打开的是可以实时自动刷新的。
但是在iOS上展示时，页面没有刷新。通过命令 `npm run dev & npm run serve`，保存后，一直没找到正确的监听方式地址。
```objc
NSString *wsport = queryDict[@"wsport"] ?: @"8082";
    NSURL *socketURL = [NSURL URLWithString:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"ws://%@:%@", url.host, wsport]];
    controller.hotReloadSocket = [[SRWebSocket alloc] initWithURL:socketURL protocols:@[@"echo-protocol"]];
    controller.hotReloadSocket.delegate = controller;
    [controller.hotReloadSocket open];
```
ip是本机调试的ip，端口号从8080到8084都试过了，一直连接失败，报错不是拒绝连接，就是超时。
求解，iOS上能像网页那样实时刷新吗
## Environment

<!-- The environment to reproduce this bug, such as **Weex Version** and **Device Mode**. -->
<!-- You can get the environment of your device by [this example](http://dotwe.org/vue/1dea64f527db3fd109c0fb682d41c14f). -->

## Broken Example

<!-- Please offer an example on the [online editor of Weex](http://dotwe.org/) to reproduce this bug. -->

## Steps to Reproduce

<!-- Clear and concise steps to reproduce this bug. -->

@songxing10000 that's a necessary feature for the weex develop, and we are currently adjusting the code for the playground, and for the manual launch we will also cover this feature on `weex-toolkit@2.x`.

For now, we suggest you using `weex run [ios/android]` command to preview your page on native device, it will support the hot-reload feature.

Also, you can use the weex VSCode extension to do this job, it's easier for you to run the device.

See: https://github.com/weex-cli/vscode-weex.

title: NA
body:
关于路由跳转，rn 社区处理的也很不优雅，react-navigation 第三方模块还在试验阶段。微信小程序页面跳转机制用起来就很方便，weex 可以借鉴把这个功能做到内核里，暴露一个全局对象，主要就提供几个 api

- weex.navigateTo()  跳转某个页面，往路由栈添加一条信息；
- weex.redirectTo()   重定向到某个页面，删除路由栈中信息；
- ........

body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Please follow the [Bug Report Guidelines](http://weex-project.io/bug-report-guidelines.html) to file issues. A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!--
感谢使用 Weex。请遵照 [Bug 报告指南](http://weex-project.io/cn/bug-report-guidelines.html) 创建 issue，希望你可以提供如下信息：

pullingdown事件中的pullingDistance属性取值在iOS端为负值但是在安卓端为正值

title: NA
body: 确实，我也碰到了，我把ios端的值改为取绝对值了

title: NA
body: @sinbadmaster Please provide a reproducible demo on the site of http://dotwe.org/vue/

title: NA
body:
文件 WXScrollerComponent.mm
方法 - (void)scrollViewDidScroll:(UIScrollView *)scrollView
下面这一段代码中，REFRESH_PULLINGDISTANCE 下拉时返回的是负值，而在Android中是正值
```
    [_refreshComponent pullingdown:@{
             REFRESH_DISTANCE_Y: @(fabs((scrollView.contentOffset.y - _lastContentOffset.y)/scaleFactor)),
             REFRESH_VIEWHEIGHT: @(_refreshComponent.view.frame.size.height/scaleFactor),
             REFRESH_PULLINGDISTANCE: @(scrollView.contentOffset.y/scaleFactor),
             @"type":@"pullingdown"
    }];
```

title: NA
body: 已修复，https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/2109

title: [Discussion] Move android build file to root
body:
Currently it's in android folder, it make IDE like android studio and IntelliJ IDEA hard to view other directory like cpp code.
I can send a pr to this, but I would like to know will this kind of change will be accept.

title: NA
body:
Thanks for your advice, but I don't think it's a good idea.

Weex is a mixed technology, it contains both Android, iOS, and front-end projects, not just Android. The source codes of them are located in different folders, which is `android`, `ios`, `runtime`, and `weex_core`, they also wrote in different languages. I think it's a good idea to manage them separately, the root path should be reserved for readme, license, build scripts, and other platform-independent files.

For those IDEs, I think we can do more configure things to make them easy to use.

title: header or sticky in cell and recycle-list is useless
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Please follow the [Bug Report Guidelines](http://weex-project.io/bug-report-guidelines.html) to file issues. A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!--
感谢使用 Weex。请遵照 [Bug 报告指南](http://weex-project.io/cn/bug-report-guidelines.html) 创建 issue，希望你可以提供如下信息：
-->

## Description

<!-- The brief description of the potential bug. -->
First of all, i have some date like:
```js
data = [
    {
        header: 'need to be rendered as a header',
        list: ['a', 'b', 'c']
    },
    .......
]
```

If i apply it in scroller, it's ok. However the performance is not really perfect especially the data is huge. So i decide to use list or recycle-list. But when i use it in list or recycle-list , it is useless. But in web , it's ok.

Of course, if i use header under the list instead of cell, i works. But i need to write it one by one and i need to know the length of data, it is really ugly.

So i'm really looking forward to using header in cell or recycle-list.

## Environment

<!-- The environment to reproduce this bug, such as **Weex Version** and **Device Mode**. -->
<!-- You can get the environment of your device by [this example](http://dotwe.org/vue/1dea64f527db3fd109c0fb682d41c14f). -->

title: NA
body: That's because js framework wrapped `try catch` to the [callback functions](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/0.19.0/runtime/bridge/CallbackManager.js#L65-L70) and [event handlers](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/rc-0.20.0/runtime/vdom/Element.js#L485-L496) and console it out. I think it's a good idea to throw the exceptions to native handlers, I'll remove those `try catch` in the next version.

title: Vuex, web, must call Vue.use(Vuex) before creating a store instance
body:
## web end Vuex
```js
/* global Vue */

/* weex initialized here, please do not move this line */
import router from './router'
import store from '@/store/index'
import App from '@/index'

// Vuex is auto installed on the web
if (WXEnvironment.platform !== 'Web') {
  Vue.use(store)
}

/* eslint-disable no-new */
new Vue(Vue.util.extend({el: '#root', router, store}, App))
```
error message `[vuex] must call Vue.use(Vuex) before creating a store instance`

```json
{
    "vue": "^2.5.11",
    "vue-router": "^3.0.1",
    "vuex": "^3.0.1",
    "weex-vue-render": "^1.0.17"
}
```

title: 如何动态的移除和添加一个普通 div 间接达到 z-index 的效果 (不通过v-if)？
body:
可能我没有陈述清楚自己的需求。
这里再做一次详细讨论。
我是希望通过动态的创建、添加一个新的 div，使得多个层之间的**叠加次序改变**，达到 css 中 **z-index** 这个属性的效果。
@zshshr 有写出示范代码，非常感谢，但 **v-if** 并不能在移动端改变层与层之间的叠加次序。

我想举一个应用场景来说明 **z-index** 的重要性：

**单页应用中，一个自定义的 Alert 窗口（就是一个 div）在顶层，此时遇到两个难题：
1、用户打开一个新的层 C ，一个 div 构成的物件，这个时候，如何将 C 覆盖在 Alert 之上？ 
2、即便是已经把 C 覆盖在 Alert 上，此时要再次显示 Alert ，如何调整 Alert 所在层使之回到最顶端？ 如果不能调整，如何创建一个 新的 Alert 层并添加到渲染中？**

这里单独提一下**单页应用** single page web application，SPA（在单页应用中并没有多个 Weex 实例，而是只有一个，weex 不支持 Websocket 在多个实例中共享，关闭 Weex 实例的时候，Websocket也随之销毁，所以只能选择单页应用，否则页面多起来的时候就很麻烦，每个页面要单独开一个 Websocket，关闭页面的时候也要频繁的断开重连 websocket）

所以希望 阿里 要么能解决 Weex 中 Websocket 共享的问题，要么支持一下 z-index，这个特性在游戏引擎中非常常见，在 Web 特效中也非常常见。

_Originally posted by @zshshr in https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues/1810#issuecomment-441946247_

title: NA
body: You are welcome to  provide  a pull request to solve the  problem of WebSocket sharing. And we has no plan to support this feature in short term .

body:
对于 View 层次改变问题，也许可以通过编写一个容器组件来根据配置生成多个叠放的 Alert，需要修改层次的时候更新这个容器组件的配置即可。

对于 WebSocket 的共享问题，也许可以通过跨页面通信的方式来解决，最先启动的 Weex 页面来负责建立连接，然后将消息分发到其他页面....

不支持 z-index 这个问题感觉是有点痛苦，特别是要做一些动画切换效果的时候...

title: Registered custom component functions may override the framework's own functions
body:
The functions of the components registered by registerComponents are likely to override the functions of Element and Node. These functions are the following in the type Element: 
  'removeEvent',
  'toStyle',
  'appendChild',
  'clear',
  'fireEvent',
  'insertAfter',
  'insertBefore',
  'removeChild',
  'addEvent',
  'setAttr',
  'setAttrs',
  'setClassStyle',
  'setStyle',
  'setStyles',
  'toJSON',
  'toString',

and In type Node is
'destroy'

What causes this? Because the registered custom component in Weex corresponds to the type WeexElement, it inherits from Element, and Element defines some functions that operate Node. These Nodes correspond to native components. If these functions are override, they are originally defined on Element. The called function becomes called directly on the native component.

This will lead us to be familiar with the implementation details of weex, and can't use the above name to name the function of the custom component.

So I recommend that all variable names that may be override by the user be prefixed with "$", as Vue does.

Below is an example:

public class test extends WXComponent  {
   public void appendChild () {
     // override the same name function defined by weex Element'
   },
   public void removeChild () {
     // override the same name function defined by weex Element'
   }
}

registerComponents([{"type": "test", "methods": ["appendChild", "removeChild"]}])

title: NA
body: @Hanks10100 I think that if a user-defined component function might override the function defined by the framework itself, the documentation should give a description, and those function names are reserved by the framework and cannot be defined by the user. Otherwise, the user must be familiar with the details of the framework to avoid intercepting the functionality of the framework itself.

title: recommend to add a reference to the parent component for removeElement
body:
I am trying to adapt weex to work on platforms other than iOS and android. I found some rendering directive definitions not very convenient at work.
If I add a reference to the parent component for removeElement, I can implement this removeElement directive more easily.

After adding the parameters referenced to the parent component, the removeElement directive implementation looks like this:
callRemoveElement(instanceId, parentRef, ref)

title: NA
body: Welcome to submit a pull request to add removeElement ，and other question what is the platform that you trying to adapter ？

title: NA
body: @zshshr webgl

title: NA
body: Can you show us more detail about your  plan ?

title: NA
body:
Currently only a preliminary implementation, register components of the webgl engine layaair with registerComponents to the weex framework, and then adapt the following functions.
callCreateFinish
callUpdateFinish
callRefreshFinish
callCreateBody
callAddElement
callRemoveElement
callMoveElement
callUpdateAttrs
callUpdateStyle
callAddEvent
callRemoveEvent
callNativeModule
callNativeComponent
callNative

Use these functions to process the rendering instructions sent from weex,
The style follows the way weex exports to json.

The problem currently encountered is that when registering a component, the function name of the component is the same as the element handler function defined inside the weex framework, and the function that calls the element inside the framework is intercepted by the registered component function. In order to minimize the change to weex itself, I had to rename the registered component function name to "$" + the original function name.

I have already made an issue for this issue.(#1853).

title: NA
body: I will close this issue as the conversion happened in https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues/1853

title: 使用npm start，修改 router.js不能实时同步到网页中
body:
使用npm start，修改 router.js不能实时同步到网页中
Using NPM start, modifying router. JS can not be synchronized to the web page in real time

title: NA
NA
body: thank you! @erha19

title: NA
body:
是不是因为src/router.js为入口文件，就不支持热更新啊？修改.temp文件夹的router.js可以更新，但src/router.js才是源文件啊。如何实现修改src/router.js支持热更新？
Is it because src/router.js is an entry file that does not support hot updates? Modifying router. js of the. temp folder can be updated, but src/router. js is the source file. How to implement the modification of src/router.js to support hot updates? @erha19

title: NA
body: @leixuesong you can use `node-watch` to watch file of `src/router.js`, then run the transform method to process it to `.temp/router`, and I think it's unnecessary to listen to a file that is modified infrequently.

title: crash in [WXComponentManager rootViewFrameDidChange:]
body:
## crash in  [WXComponentManager rootViewFrameDidChange:] 
我们的项目在APP启动出现首页的时候就会加载2-3个weex界面控制器，偶现crash，从iOS12开始该crash的数量开始增加，目前用的WeexSDK的版本为0.18.0

## Environment
* Device: [e.g. iPhoneX]
* OS: [e.g. iOS12.01]
* Version [e.g. 0.18.0]
* Build from source [e.g. yes/no]

## Additional context
崩溃堆栈如下
0 WeexSDK | -[WXComponentManager rootViewFrameDidChange:] (WXComponentManager.m:163)
-- | --
1 WeexSDK | -[WXComponentManager rootViewFrameDidChange:] (WXComponentManager.m:163)
2 WeexSDK | __26-[WXSDKInstance setFrame:]_block_invoke_2 (WXSDKInstance.m:134)
3 WeexSDK | +[WXComponentManager _performBlockOnComponentThread:] (WXComponentManager.m:130)
4 Foundation | ___NSThreadPerformPerform + 340
5 CoreFoundation | ___CFRUNLOOP_IS_CALLING_OUT_TO_A_SOURCE0_PERFORM_FUNCTION__ + 24
6 CoreFoundation | ___CFRunLoopDoSource0 + 88
7 CoreFoundation | ___CFRunLoopDoSources0 + 204
8 CoreFoundation | ___CFRunLoopRun + 1048
9 CoreFoundation | CFRunLoopRunSpecific + 436
10 Foundation | -[NSRunLoop(NSRunLoop) runMode:beforeDate:] + 304
11 WeexSDK | -[WXComponentManager _runLoopThread] (WXComponentManager.m:122)
12 Foundation | ___NSThread__start__ + 996
13 libsystem_pthread.dylib | __pthread_body + 308
14 libsystem_pthread.dylib | __pthread_body

title: ios, build question
body:
sorry, my English isn't very good.

* run `npm run build` , `platforms/ios/bundlejs` Not here create `index.js`
* first run `npm run ios` after that `npm run build` create `index.js`

I wonder if this is normal.

title: NA
body: @qzcsgs It works as our expected now, for the official project, the `npm run build` command will build source to the `dist` folder, while the `npm run ios` command was called, the script will copy files from `dist` to `platforms/ios/bundlejs`, also it will re-run the command `npm run build` command to get the latest products.

title: NA
body:
You demo seems incorrect, here is the new one http://dotwe.org/vue/9a25405b1283b6dfd9ee7d56907d50e1

1. The root `<div>` is will be rendered to the whole screen by default, do not animate the size of it.
2. The `width` style should contain a unit, such as `px`.
3. Your `transition-property` is `left`, but you are changing the `width`.

title: iOS 0.19.0 版本toast队列无法清空的问题
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Please follow the [Bug Report Guidelines](http://weex-project.io/bug-report-guidelines.html) to file issues. A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!--
感谢使用 Weex。请遵照 [Bug 报告指南](http://weex-project.io/cn/bug-report-guidelines.html) 创建 issue，希望你可以提供如下信息：
-->

## Description

<!-- The brief description of the potential bug. -->

当weex页面销毁时，如果toast队列不为空，则队列里面的toast无法展示，并且不会被清理，有可能造成下次调用toast时，把旧的toast展示出来。

## Environment

<!-- The environment to reproduce this bug, such as **Weex Version** and **Device Mode**. -->
<!-- You can get the environment of your device by [this example](http://dotwe.org/vue/1dea64f527db3fd109c0fb682d41c14f). -->

版本：weex sdk 0.19.0

## Steps to Reproduce

<!-- Please offer an example on the [online editor of Weex](http://dotwe.org/) to reproduce this bug. -->

在页面中创建多个toast并在toast没展示完时，退出页面。

## reason

产生此bug的关键代码如下：

当weex页面销毁时，weakself是nil，所以这个递归调用不下去了，无法清除队列数据

![img](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4581299/50008362-e25f5d00-ffee-11e8-8473-f10dd2a233c9.png)

title: NA
body: 谢谢反馈，已经修复。https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/2106

title: weex在android上的渲染速度如何优化
body:
weex项目build到原生android中，一个activity从onCreate到renderSucc的耗时：
简单页面，只有一个空div需要1秒左右
复杂一些的，比如列表+子组件的 就要2.5秒+

那么问题来了，从打开activity到页面渲染完成，这中间的几秒空白页，大家是如何处理的呢？

title: NA
body: 你这包括网络时间吗？有做一些预缓存之类的处理吗

title: NA
body: 就一个空的页面，不包含任何控件，js文件是放在android项目本地的，所以没有网络时间，也没有缓存

title: NA

title: NA
body:
这个问题我们也很关注，不过一个空的div耗时1s有点过分了，之前我trace过整个weex的渲染性能问题，性能主要是下面两点：
1. 低端机器上性能热点主要表现在jscore执行js的耗时
2. 高端机器上的性能热点主要表现在core抛出虚拟dom到java层执行的时间，虚拟dom到真正执行时抛的一个个message执行的，而且是单线程，很容易出现不同页面之间的操作相互干扰的现象。之前测试过，单独加载一个页面只需要1s，同时加载2个一样的页面，两个都需要1.5s。

我们根据渲染性能的问题提了这样一个pr，希望对你有帮助：
https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/1978

body: 补充：以上问题在android sdk

title: NA
body: 感谢提问，可以提PullRequest上来，我们会评估你的改动

title: NA
body: 能解释下具体场景么，什么场景下需要调用`WXSDKInstance. getWXRenderListener `

title: NA
body:
对线上项目进行修改时比较有用。
比如我需要在render错误的时候统一将错误信息提交到服务器，如果没有暴露此监听则需要打开原文件然后在onException的时候添加上报代码，相反则只需要添加一个新的类然后通过`WXSDKInstance.getWXRenderListener`拿到此监听，对此监听做一次包装就可以实现此功能，并且对源代码没有侵入性。
PS. 虽然也可以通过反射获得，但暴露出来应该不会有危险

title: NA
body:
> 比如我需要在render错误的时候统一将错误信息提交到服务器，如果没有暴露此监听则需要打开原文件然后在onException的时候添加上报代码

* 如果Render出错 *如网络错误、JS执行错误*，sdk底层一定会调用 `RenderListener.onException`。你是在什么场景下，遇到Render出错，且`RenderListener.onException`没有被调用
* 这个接口没有暴露是为了避免weex的Native端使用者错误的调用RenderListener的生命周期函数，如`onException`，导致生命周期被错误的触发。

title: NA
NA
body:
> 我不想改现有工程代码，想直接通过Application#registerActivityLifecycleCallbacks注册并在onActivityResumed方法中统一通过WXSDKInstance#getRenderListener获得原有的监听，然后再写一个包装类，并在onException方法里实现上报的功能。

依然没有理解，按照给出的代码实例，你添加了一个WXRenderListenerWrapper来执行异常上传逻辑，这个也是改了代码的啊。添加一个新的`WXRenderListenerWrapper`和修改已有的`IWXRenderListener`，本质上没啥区别吧

title: NA
body:
对于修改点来说区别不大，都是加相同逻辑。对于某些应用场景还是比较有用的，比如我们android项目都引用一个common module，我的应用场景就是修改common module在此处添加勾子，对于业务开发部门是无感的，他们仅需升级公共模块的版本，对于非业务功能他们并不需要关心。
我了解你们未暴露此监听的出发点，也赞同你们的顾虑。
目前我们通过反射解决，仅进入画面时反射一次并不会影响速度。
![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16704088/51425213-fe6ca480-1c13-11e9-85fd-fa4ab5aff3e8.png)

title: NA
body: 如果是这个场景，建议你们使用Java中的动态代理机制实现`IWXRenderListener`。

title: pre-build Vue don't have call method
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Please follow the [Bug Report Guidelines](http://weex-project.io/bug-report-guidelines.html) to file issues. A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!-- Requirements: please go through this checklist before opening a new issue -->
  - [x] Review the documentation: https://weex.apache.org/index.html
  - [x] Search for existing issues: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues
  - [x] Use the latest Weex release: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases

## Describe the bug

I use typescript to write weex vue,the compiled code is like:

```
 function Example(params) {
                        var _this = _super.call(this, params) || this;
                        _this.infoKey = 'weex';
                        return _this;
                    }

                    Example.prototype.created = function () {
                        modal.toast({
                            message: typeof vue__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1___default.a
                        });
                    };

```

There is a  js error `_super.call is undefined`

Here is the compiled file:
<https://gist.github.com/xiaomingplus/0b34a5af012b8069ba11405c4324d26a#file-weex-demo-js>

I also see the pre-build vue version 2.5.16,but the package.json weex-vue-framwork 2.5.13-weex.5"
```
"Start JS Framework 0.29.1, Build at 2018-12-19 16:07. (Vue: 2.5.16-weex.5, Rax: 0.4.20)");
```
So,where are the vue source?

## To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior.  Include a MCVE using http://dotwe.org/vue , crash stacktrace or  share your app project. Please follow the guidelines for providing a MCVE: https://stackoverflow.com/help/mcve

## Environment
* Device: [e.g. iPhone6]iPhone X
* OS: [e.g. iOS8.1]iOS 12
* Version [e.g. 22] 0.20.1
* Build from source [e.g. yes/no] no

## Expected behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
 
<https://gist.github.com/xiaomingplus/0b34a5af012b8069ba11405c4324d26a#file-weex-demo-js> work well.

## Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

## Additional context
Add any other context about the problem here.

I think the problem may be: 
```js
import * as Vue from 'vue'
```
instead of:

```js
import Vue from 'vue'
```

from here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43051838/how-to-solve-super-apply-is-not-a-function-in-vuejs-component-typescript

title: 刷新组件在不满足条件时，刷新条不会消失
body:
## Describe the bug
下拉组件的处理函数 `onrefresh`  中，如果` return` 了，页面顶部的刷新条不会消失。
使用的场景：需要控制刷新的频率

## To Reproduce
http://dotwe.org/vue/602447ef81f540a42c114e7c537d5e7b

## Environment
网页版和安卓端 Weex playground app 

## Expected behavior
下拉刷新时，如果不满足条件，释放后页面回弹
只有满足以下条件时才显示刷新条
```js
this.refreshing = true
```

## Screenshots
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23056320/50679958-a42ee980-1040-11e9-828f-ed8e4bc265ab.png)

title: NA
body:
回弹是由refreshing = true和false控制的
需先refreshing=true,然后refreshing=false回弹
状态改变间需要有一定间隔，建议
this.refreshing = true
setTimeout(()=>{this.refreshing=false},10)

title: NA
body:
> 回弹是由refreshing = true和false控制的
> 需先refreshing=true,然后refreshing=false回弹
> 状态改变间需要有一定间隔，建议
> this.refreshing = true
> setTimeout(()=>{this.refreshing=false},10)

谢谢

title: 想请教关于解决WeexSDK deadlock的思路
body:
hello,我在WeexSDK的提交记录里找到了解决因为[WXSDKInstance dealloc]和[WXJSCoreBridge dealloc]偶现死锁的两个commit
https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/commit/d25ed7af3b3527310336d0d2308e7dec8a5fca12#diff-b93d75ed1315a84c9300d2afc84e24a8

https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/commit/78b887ce8256d3e13c3cfa0294c286db05efccb9

通过这个两个commit的修改内容，也解决我遇到的死锁问题。不过我看了代码后还是有些疑问，
第一是为什么在WXThreadSafeMutableDictionary  removeObjectForKey加锁期间，WXSDKInstance delloc会触发死锁；
第二是为什么WXJSCoreBridge在主线程释放会造成死锁。
查了一下资料，还是不怎么明白，WeexSDK项目组的研发大大们能否指点迷津，不胜感激

title: NA
body: 原意是加了一个远程配置，实验性测试在非主线程removeInstance能性能效果。你这样只是把配置项改为不生效强制在主线程removeInstance了。死锁详情还要从整体机制判断

title: NA
body: 最新版本已经修复这些问题了，不会死锁了，也没有之前的那些配置。

title: NA
body: WXThreadSafeMutableDictionary的removeObjectForKey引发死锁是因为在WXThreadSafeMutableDictionary的锁里面对象被释放，之后一些逻辑导致又调用到WXThreadSafeMutableDictionary的方法里了导致死锁。现在WXThreadSafeMutableDictionary里被移除的对象被临时变量持有一下，在锁外面释放了。

title: NA
body: WXJSCoreBridge在主线程释放会死锁是因为JSC里面的锁导致的，比如在主线程释放时进入了JSC的锁，但此时在js线程里有callNative什么的调用，就有可能死锁。现在WXJSCoreBridge也改到JS线程释放了。

title: NA
body: 图片在不见的时候自动回收，在可见的时候重新加载，这个主要是为了节省内存考虑，毕竟图片不可见了，还占着内存也不太合理。如果不需要这个特性，可以设置`auto-bitmap-recycle="false"`

title: input控件在weex playground app和官网web端playground表现不一致
body:
## Describe the bug
playground链接：
http://dotwe.org/vue/31e7dfa04c60ff3b78aaae526d971374
1、web端打开上面链接，只要输入大于999的值，input控件都只会显示999，如下图：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22371994/51365620-1a8d1a80-1b1c-11e9-9da0-89509d6191d3.png)

2、打开weex playground app，扫码上面链接提供的二维码，输入大于999的值，input控件可以显示大于999的值，如下图：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22371994/51365639-2d075400-1b1c-11e9-9aa5-81d2ebc4e76e.png)


## Environment
app端：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22371994/51365648-385a7f80-1b1c-11e9-963a-946317ef670a.png)
PC端：Chrome

## Expected behavior
希望实现的效果是：当用户在上input控件输入的值大于999时，input控件内的值只会显示999

## others：
如果将上面链接中oninput里面用setTimeout去赋值，app端就生效了
```JavaScript
oninput: function (event) {
        if (event.value > 999) {
          setTimeout(() => { this.txtInput = 999 })
        } else {
          this.txtInput = event.value;
        }
      },
```

title: NA
body:
有使用真机测试，后面发现了问题，使用ifconfig查看IP地址如下：
```
lo0: flags=8049<UP,LOOPBACK,RUNNING,MULTICAST> mtu 16384
	options=1203<RXCSUM,TXCSUM,TXSTATUS,SW_TIMESTAMP>
	inet 127.0.0.1 netmask 0xff000000 
	inet6 ::1 prefixlen 128 
	inet6 fe80::1%lo0 prefixlen 64 scopeid 0x1 
	inet 10.6.6.6 netmask 0xff000000 
	nd6 options=201<PERFORMNUD,DAD>
```
系统默认使用了10.6.6.6 作为服务器地址，当使用手机的app扫描时，虽然在同一局域但是手机是无法访问10.6.6.6，后面使用
`weex debug --host 172.168.1.23 `
可以正常使用

title: ttf字体无效,woff未测试
body:
设备:iPhone 6 
系统: iOS 11.4 未越狱
weex版本:0.20.0
week playground版本：4.0
demo链接:[http://dotwe.org/vue/4641bfd0ab806674d62cb00a9ad2dddb](http://dotwe.org/vue/4641bfd0ab806674d62cb00a9ad2dddb)
源码warn:<Weex>[warn]WXUtility.m:536, Unknown fontFamily:'weexUiIconFont'

问题产生源文件WXTextComponent.m：
行数185至194
`- (BOOL)useCoreText`
`{`
`    if ([_useCoreTextAttr isEqualToString:@"true"]) {`
`        return YES;`
`    }`
`    if ([_useCoreTextAttr isEqualToString:@"false"]) {`
`        return NO;`
`    }`
`    return YES;//问题在这，此处改为false   或者 所有的text标签按如下写法 <text  coretext="false" :style="mergeStyle" ></text>`
`}`
**coretext="false" 是关键**
因公司业务源码需要修改的地方太多，我在这将return YES;改为return NO;

body:

初步判断是 WXUtility.m 文件中的 `+ (UIFont *)fontWithSize:(CGFloat)size textWeight:(CGFloat)textWeight textStyle:(WXTextStyle)textStyle fontFamily:(NSString *)fontFamily scaleFactor:(CGFloat)scaleFactor useCoreText:(BOOL)useCoreText` 方法有问题，将0.18.0 版本的实现代码拿过来是可以正常显示的，期待官方修复此问题

body:

debugger：
    compile 'com.taobao.android:weex_inspector:0.18.10'
    compile 'com.github.shenyuanqing.zxing:zxing-simplify:1.0.5'
    compile 'com.squareup.okhttp:okhttp:2.3.0'
    compile 'com.squareup.okhttp:okhttp-ws:2.3.0'

启动app闪退，错误日志如下：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36951996/51810956-b9b4cd80-22e5-11e9-93e2-0db9f292e5c9.png)

title: NA
body:
weex_inspetor升级成最新版
 compile 'com.taobao.android:weex_inspector:0.18.68'
不崩溃了，但是debugger连不上，
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36951996/51817008-0b6c5080-2304-11e9-8ab1-d4b94ce25422.png)

title: NA
body:
@fanlvwen please use `weex-debugger` but not `weex-devtool`, you can upgrade your `weex-toolkit` via `npm i weex-toolkit@latest -g`, also you can use the alpha version via `npm i weex-toolkit@alpha -g`.

To integrate android devtool SDK, you can use the version below:
```
weex_sdk: 0.20.3.0-beta
weex_inspector: 0.20.3.0-beta
```
That's the devtool SDK which playground app using now.

title: NA
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36951996/52529319-9993fe00-2d2a-11e9-9dbe-49dac51c9fd8.png)
开启weex项目的debugger就爆内存了，所以才用的devtool
内存溢出之后，尝试使用网上的解决方案都无效
@erha19

title: NA
body:
@fanlvwen 这个主要是由于文件数太多导致的编译期内存泄露问题，一般我们建议通过weex-debugger去编译单个或少数文件来进行便捷的编译服务，weex-debugger中只会提供基础的编译配置，这意味着一旦文件数量增多，编译耗时会随之增加，编译的过程也可能由于某些文件的错误被中断，让问题边的更难以定位。

你这种情况我建议你不要使用weex-debugger中的编译能力进行项目编译（或者指定粒度更小的文件夹，如src/component/xxx）, 更加良好的方式是建立项目内的构建体系，通过本地的webpack配置你的项目构建流程，具体的项目可参考 weex create 命令创建出的项目。

title: NA
body:
> @fanlvwen 这个主要是由于文件数太多导致的编译期内存泄露问题，一般我们建议通过weex-debugger去编译单个或少数文件来进行便捷的编译服务，weex-debugger中只会提供基础的编译配置，这意味着一旦文件数量增多，编译耗时会随之增加，编译的过程也可能由于某些文件的错误被中断，让问题边的更难以定位。
> 
> 你这种情况我建议你不要使用weex-debugger中的编译能力进行项目编译（或者指定粒度更小的文件夹，如src/component/xxx）, 更加良好的方式是建立项目内的构建体系，通过本地的webpack配置你的项目构建流程，具体的项目可参考 weex create 命令创建出的项目。

感谢回答，还是想再请问为什么devtool@v0.3.2-beta.7 是可以正常的debug呢？

title: NA
body: @fanlvwen 编译问题按道理不会影响调试流程，只是在后续的`weex-debugger`设计中，把编译逻辑作为前置的判断，编译失败->导致工具无法启动，所以你才调试不了，这块在新的工具里会进行调整。

title: NA
body: @erha19 好的谢谢，那我等weex-debugger升级

尊敬的用户，您好

很抱歉，该网站暂时无法访问，可能由以下原因导致：

原因一：未备案或未接入；根据《非经营性互联网信息服务备案管理办法》，网站需要完成备案或接入。

原因二：网站内容与备案信息不符或备案信息不准确；根据《非经营性互联网信息服务备案管理办法》，网站内容需要与备案信息一致，且备案信息需真实有效。建议网站管理员尽快修改网站信息。

title: weex.io   https://market.dotwe.org/ 无法打开
body:
上次我已经反馈过，到现在应该2个星期过去了，官方对外开放的链接能不能弄好一点啊，随便开，随便关，
我上次反馈打不开的时候，官方让我关注 weex.io  好我关注这个，新的官网很不错，比http://weex.apache.org 这个好看多了，也更方便阅读了，但是过了2个星期 weex.io 又打不开了，大家都是成年人，能弄点靠谱的事情不？既然你对外开放，这个就相当于你的产品身份证，别人也只能通过这些入口来了解贵公司的产品，但是这样一会打得开，一会打不开，会让人对weex很失望的，即使你功能做的差一点也没关系，但是要保证稳定啊，这样真的让人感觉开发weex的这些哥们,就像闹着玩似的，说不一定那一天脑子一热又去搞别的了，然后weex又不维护了。

要换地址可以，要做好善后处理好吧！程序员大哥们能用产品的心态去对待工作和生活么？

title: [iOS] webpack.common.conf.js 没有初始化 process.env ,渲染页面失败
body:

title: Screen orientation problem with iPad version of our app
body:
## Description

Our latest version of app works well on the iPad in portrait, but the page size cannot be recalculated when changed to landscape.

How can we resize the instance view when screen orientation change?

Thank you～

![](http://img.reaidea.com/ipad0.jpg)
![](http://img.reaidea.com/ipad.jpg)

title: NA
NA
NA
body: @wqyfavor 下边WXCoreBridge的原生方法没有合到分支里

title: NA
NA
body:
> @wqyfavor 新春快乐！我们现在最大的问题就是要页面渲染完成之后用户还可能随时旋转屏幕切换横竖屏，页面要自适应屏幕尺寸。
> 
> 我们的 App 有大量的视频课程，用户可能会竖屏看完文章再横屏看视频课，尤其是 iPad Pro 用户往往会配置一个外接键盘，在各种场景下随意切换我们的 App 横竖屏状态。
> 
> 不知道有没有什么好办法解决渲染完成后旋转屏幕页面重新适应屏幕尺寸？

这个需要想一下怎么办。因为元素styles里的宽、高、top、left等信息是创建时根据屏幕宽度和view-port计算的，当旋转后，并不是简单的重新触发排版就可以，需要根据js里的原始的style信息重新计算。如果页面已经发生变化，就很不好办了。

> > 我们的 App 有大量的视频课程，用户可能会竖屏看完文章再横屏看视频课，尤其是 iPad Pro 用户往往会配置一个外接键盘，在各种场景下随意切换我们的 App 横竖屏状态。

感谢回复！这个难度确实很大，深表理解。

我们之前也确实没有考虑过这种问题，最近适配了一下 iPad 才发现坑太多了……

title: NA
body:
was having the same issue and addressed it without going into the OS specific code, just by forcing a refresh on a component. here's how:
1. bind some global variable to a component's key
```
<template lang="pug">
.wrapper
    router-view(:key="store.resetView") # store.resetView initializes as integer = 0
</template>
```
2. Install Nat.js Library _(maybe it can be done without, but I need it anyway for other things)_
3. create orientation variable in store and set interval polling of Nat.screen.orientation.status every 500ms
4. compare current orientation value with the one in store, if different, add 1 to resetView
```
<script lang="coffee">
module.exports =
    methods:
        rotationInterval: ->
            Nat.screen.orientation.status (err, ret) =>
                if @orientation != ret.orientation
                   ++@store.resetView
                   @orientation = ret.orientation
</script>
```

this will force the component to refresh every time a screen rotation is detected by the Nat component

02-13 10:42:04.542 22053 22053 I crash_recorder:  #  2  0x40008e2d  (null)(  )
02-13 10:42:04.542 22053 22053 I crash_recorder:  #  3  0x5b96ed27  libweexcore.so( _ZN8WeexCore9WeexProxy28initFrameworkInSingleProcessEP7_JNIEnvP8_jstringSt6vectorIP19InitFramewok

Through the log: futex lock pi failed: Function not implemented, we think problem mey appear in the follow place:
```
// IPCFutexPageQueue::lock
while (true) {
        int futexReturn = __futex(pageStart, FUTEX_LOCK_PI, 1, nullptr);
        if (futexReturn == -1 && errno != EINTR) {

            volatile uint32_t* pageStart0 = static_cast<volatile uint32_t*>(getPage(0));
            volatile uint32_t* pageStart1 = static_cast<volatile uint32_t*>(getPage(1));
            volatile uint32_t* pageStart2 = static_cast<volatile uint32_t*>(getPage(2));
            volatile uint32_t* pageStart3 = static_cast<volatile uint32_t*>(getPage(3));
            throw IPCException("futex lock pi failed: %s, %x %x (%x %x %x %x)", strerror(errno), *pageStart, m_tid, *pageStart0, *pageStart1, *pageStart2, *pageStart3);
        }
        if (futexReturn == -1)
            continue;
        break;
    }

```

We think there are some problems on the usage of __futex, this problem only occer on Api 19 or lower, and when initFrameworkOnMultiProcess because of this problem ,our app crash on initFrameWorkOnSingleProcess because of dlopen.

title: NA
body: The code mentioned is in `IPCFutexPageQueue::lock`, please have a look @Darin726 Thanks

title: NA
body: hi, I cannot find "arm64-v8a" and "x86_64" in the lib folder.

title: NA
body: @YorkShen 这个问题为什么关了，并没有看到 "arm64-v8a"这个目录，只有v7a和arm等。你说的已经支持是什么意思呢？可以把v7a的so直接放到v8a目录？

title: NA
body:
1. There is no `arm64-v8a` folders now, but as 64 bit CPU would always fallback to 32 bit if `arm64-v8a` doesn't exist, so there is no problem to run weex on a 64 bit CPU.
2. We are planning to add `arm64-v8a` folders for better performance, but no detail schedule yet.
3. According to [community guideline](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list), Github issues is only for bug report, you should discuss new features in mailing list.

title: NA
body: @YorkShen Starting August 1, 2019, your apps published on Google Play will need to support 64-bit architectures. 64-bit CPUs deliver faster, richer experiences for your users. Adding a 64-bit version of your app provides performance improvements, makes way for future innovation, and sets you up for devices with 64-bit-only hardware. [https://developer.android.com/distribute/best-practices/develop/64-bit](url)

title: 大家有没有遇到过用appium无法定位和操作weex控件的情况？
body:
如题，我们公司App是用weex技术写的，在如下界面时，可以定位到所有选项，
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42204523/53136514-3d4a9d00-35ba-11e9-91e8-094112ac01a1.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42204523/53136524-46d40500-35ba-11e9-8aff-5ae62f21fae6.png)
点击状态，优先级和截止时间会有一个弹窗如下
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42204523/53136538-58b5a800-35ba-11e9-894b-a38b7c09d9da.png)
在弹出的窗口点击确定或取消后返回到新建任务界面。这时我的driver就失效了，不能定位元素，也不能做任何其他操作。定位元素【任务内容】会报错nosuchelement。我用driver.find_elements_by_xpath('//*')查询当前页面所有元素也一直在加载没有任何反应。
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42204523/53136561-6bc87800-35ba-11e9-9462-1d40e827ba02.png)

请问这种情况是什么原因引起的？

title: NA
body:
看起来和Appium测试框架有关，我这里也无法推断具体原因。

使用Appium，是想要做哪方面的测试呢

> 看起来和Appium测试框架有关，我这里也无法推断具体原因。
> 
> 使用Appium，是想要做哪方面的测试呢

主要是做跨平台的UI自动化测试，在写测试脚本时发现，Android平台中涉及到上图类型的弹窗控件，一旦我点击了【确定】/【取消】以后，在接下来的界面就无法再定位到元素。只能使用press_keycode()返回首页。（也就是说点击控件中的【确定】/【取消】以后，虽然无法定位到当前页面的元素了，但driver驱动还是能用的）。我咨询过其他人，他们说没有这种情况，因为他们不是用的appium。

title: [Android] Package names `com.taobao.*` and `com.alibaba.*`?
body:
When looking at PR https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/2071 I noticed that the Android package names include `com.taobao` and `com.alibaba`. 

Is this here to stay or will this be updated to `org.apache.*`?

title: NA
body:
This is a problem I want to solve years ago.

But as there are many util class or base class under `com.taobao` and `com.alibaba` package, such as `com.taobao.weex.ui.component.WXComponent`, which is the base class for almost every UI component.

If we change the package name directly to `org.apache.*`, users with custom plugins that extends the base class like `com.taobao.weex.ui.component.WXComponent` or uses the util class will have many problems when updating to the latest version, as the package renaming will cause lots of compiling issue.

Any advice on reducing the cost of renaming for Weex users?

title: NA
body:
I honestly don't know much about Android development.

Is there a way to maybe rename the real classes but keep an "alias" with the old name around so plugin can keep working?

title: NA
body:
> Is there a way to maybe rename the real classes but keep an "alias" with the old name around so plugin can keep working?

Sadly, no.

As there is no way to avoid the backwards compatibility issue now, I think maybe we should keep it untouched until have a better solution.

title: NA
body: The package name has been changed to `org.apache. *`

https://v.qq.com/x/cover/f04er0aovj2et7b/c0831fn8ukt.html 
出现无法显示的情况。

重现方式：
1.进入 http://dotwe.org/vue/8bdac9c81fac5f4da2654d42bd5800d5
2.将src 改成上述视频地址，使用playground 扫描访问即可。

该问题在测试的大部分安卓机器上都出现了，烦请修复

title: NA
body:
1. Please Use English to describe your question, I will use Google translate this time

> Hi, use the web component to load the webpage, which embeds a webpage with video, and the following phenomenon occurs.
> Embed the Tencent video webpage (the browser is normal, other clients are also normal):
> Https://v.qq.com/x/cover/f04er0aovj2et7b/c0831fn8ukt.html
> A situation that cannot be displayed appears.
> 
> Reproduce method:
> 1. Go to http://dotwe.org/vue/8bdac9c81fac5f4da2654d42bd5800d5
> 2. Change src to the above video address and use the playground to scan for access.
> 
> This problem has appeared on most Android machines tested, please fix it.

2. This is the default behavior of the system's webview, which is full of bug in Android.  You may replace the System's webview by UC/QQ if you need. 

3. A PR for QQ/UC webview is welcomed.

title: [iOS] weex+vue，this.$refs.xxx.ref，普通div正常，但在v-for中的div返回undefined
NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> [iOS] weex vue, this.$refs.xxx.ref, normal div is normal, but the div in v-for returns undefined

Please provide a complete demo in [dot.we](http://dotwe.org/vue), which debugging so much more easy.

title: NA
body:
Please check the document of Vue.js (https://vuejs.org/v2/guide/components-edge-cases.html#Accessing-Child-Component-Instances-amp-Child-Elements).

> When ref is used together with v-for, the ref you get will be an array containing the child components mirroring the data source.

Try `this.$refs.for[0].ref`

title: 怎么替换内置的modal模块
body: 内置的modal模块，发现有bug，prompt()返回值为页面第一个input元素，如果页面有多个input元素就会有问题。我自己改了，但是怎么替换内置的modal

title: NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: The built-in modal module finds a bug, and the prompt() return value is the first input element of the page. If the page has multiple input elements, there will be problems. I changed it myself, but how to replace the built-in modal.

You have two options:
1. Fix the problem based on current `modal` code, and give us a Github PR, which is encouraged.
1. You can implement the modal by yourself, and register a `modal` with the same name using the below [approach](https://weex.apache.org/guide/extend/extend-android.html#module-extend)

body: 在使用stream.fetch模块的时候，有的https接口能调用，如 https://login.gpocn.com/config ，有的无法调用，如 https://tradecenter_api.gpocn.com/config ，具体什么原因，能帮我看一下吗

title: NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> When using the stream.fetch module, some https interfaces can be called, such as https://login.gpocn.com/config, some can't be called, such as https://tradecenter_api.gpocn.com/config, what is the reason? Can you help me see it?

Please follow the issue template on Github and give a demo on [dot.we](http://dotwe.org/vue), which will make life so much easier

title: NA
NA
body:
Try use [weex-toolkit](https://github.com/weexteam/weex-toolkit), you will get all the Android/iOS log.

I have captured the Android log ,which is `java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid input to toASCII: trade_api.qywgpo.com`, Google search it, you will find the [answer](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51563859/javax-net-ssl-sslhandshakeexception-java-lang-illegalargumentexception-invalid).

`_` is illegal when using https in Android network library. Try the following approach:
* Use `http` instead of `https`.
* Avoid `_` if you assist on `https`.

title: [Android] weex jscore可以直接添加一个java对象到js中吗？
body:
## Describe
weex目前java代码写的jsbridge都继承于WXModule，而且并没有注入java对象，只是传递类名方法名参数等等。

## Question
请问，weex的jscore支不支持直接往js里面注入java对象或者绕过WXModule，用普通java类来实现jsbridge？

title: [Android] weex可以往js中直接注入java对象吗？
body:
## 背景
我们有很多之前的jsbridge，但是不是给weex用的，而想要给weex用又一定要继承WXModule，这样就有一些工作量，所以想问问weex有没有方法直接往js注入一个java对象呢？
## 问题
weex可以往js中直接注入java对象吗？

title: NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> We have a lot of previous jsbridge, but not for weex, but we must inherit WXModule for weex, so there is some work, so I would like to ask if weex has a way to directly inject a java object into js?

Short answer: **NO**

Long Answer: To achieve JS -> Java communication, you need a bridge, which can be `WXModule`, `WXComponent` or even raw JNI method.

Also, please follow the [issue template](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues/new) when you report a bug. The more information you give, the faster issue will be resolved.

Thanks

`<richtext>` uses a hack way to implement inline feature on Android or iOS. I think this failure is due to the hack in JavaScript.

title: NA
[iOS] 0.19.0版本 WXComponentManager的unload方法中 _rootComponent = nil没有加锁
body:
## 背景
项目使用的是0.19.0的WeexSDK版本，最近在定位一个WXComponentManager在方法rootViewFrameDidChange:内因访问_rootComponent而崩溃的问题。目前怀疑是_rootComponent在componentThread线程创建，在主线程释放引起的


## 疑问
_rootComponent在componentThread线程创建，在主线程释放，_rootComponent = nil这行代码是否需要加锁来保证安全性呢，如果在主线程即将释放，此时componentThread线程通过指针访问_rootComponent内存区域，会不会引起崩溃呢？

## 崩溃栈
WeexSDK Version:0.19.0
Device info:iOS 12.0.1 iPhoneX

0 WeexSDK | -[WXComponentManager rootViewFrameDidChange:] (WXCoreLayout.h:891)
-- | --
1 WeexSDK | -[WXComponentManager rootViewFrameDidChange:] (WXComponentManager.mm:183)
2 WeexSDK | __26-[WXSDKInstance setFrame:]_block_invoke_2 (WXSDKInstance.m:190)
3 WeexSDK | +[WXComponentManager _performBlockOnComponentThread:] (WXComponentManager.mm:158)
4 Foundation | ___NSThreadPerformPerform + 336
5 CoreFoundation | ___CFRUNLOOP_IS_CALLING_OUT_TO_A_SOURCE0_PERFORM_FUNCTION__ + 24
6 CoreFoundation | ___CFRunLoopDoSource0 + 88
7 CoreFoundation | ___CFRunLoopDoSources0 + 176
8 CoreFoundation | ___CFRunLoopRun + 1040
9 CoreFoundation | CFRunLoopRunSpecific + 436
10 Foundation | -[NSRunLoop(NSRunLoop) runMode:beforeDate:] + 300
11 WeexSDK | -[WXComponentManager _runLoopThread] (WXComponentManager.mm:143)
12 Foundation | ___NSThread__start__ + 1040
13 libsystem_pthread.dylib | __pthread_body + 128
14 libsystem_pthread.dylib | _pthread_start + 48

body: 升级版本吧，之前确实有，但新版本在手淘里已经不再有此问题了。

title: NA
body:
我自己找到了解决办法，在sdk源码WXRecyclerComponent.mm中 
_collectionView.delegate = self;下方添加一句 _collectionView.alwaysBounceVertical = self;即可解决
不过不够严谨，如果waterfall横向就不能这么写了，希望官方能尽快修复。

- (void)setImageViewWithURL:(UIImageView*)imageView
                        url:(NSURL *)url
           placeholderImage:(UIImage *)placeholder
                    options:(NSDictionary*)options

title: NA
body: WeexSDK does not contain image downloader. You should adapt WeexSDK to a picture library such as SDWebImage. If you want to support GIF, you should make sure that your picture library supports GIF by UIImage.

title: android 0.20.0.1 component扩展设置自定义属性时，部分属性不生效
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Github Issue is only used for bur report and please follow the template to report the bug. 
A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!-- Requirements: please go through this checklist before opening a new issue
  - * Review the documentation: https://weex.apache.org/index.html
  - * Search for existing issues: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues
  - * Use the latest Weex release: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases -->


## Describe the bug
android 0.20.0.1 component扩展设置自定义属性时，部分属性不能响应式更新数据，只能在组件初始化时获取，在android studio中打了断点，没有走到断点处。
## To Reproduce
<!-- Steps to reproduce the behavior.  Include a MCVE using http://dotwe.org/vue , crash stacktrace or  share your app project. Please follow the guidelines for providing a MCVE: https://stackoverflow.com/help/mcve -->

## Environment
* Device: [HAWEI P20]
* OS: [ android 9.0]
* Version [ 0.20.0.1]
* Build from source [ yes] 

## Expected behavior
自定义component中的属性可以正常响应

## Screenshots
<!-- If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. -->
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31365524/54269000-6ce83600-45b7-11e9-9624-be27254d0604.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31365524/54269094-a02ac500-45b7-11e9-9d16-a4e871be25bf.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31365524/54269297-162f2c00-45b8-11e9-991f-d886ce2b036c.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31365524/54269250-fa2b8a80-45b7-11e9-8510-7e317361e947.png)

initComponentHostView中可以获取到，但是得到的是字符串。之后无法改变index的值了


## Additional context

title: NA
body: 在小米8SE上表现是正常的

title: NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: Android 0.20.0.1 component extension set custom properties, some properties can not respond to the update data, can only be obtained when the component is initialized, hit a breakpoint in android studio, did not go to the breakpoint.

If I am right, the index in your java code is String, but this is not true in your JS code. 

You can override `component.setProperty(String key, Object param)` to solve the problem.

Ref [WXText](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/5a52f042acd357d763d76c88a5a993e9c33e43ad/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/ui/component/WXText.java#L136
) for detail.

title: 请教：工程下ios目录改变了weex run ios不成功，怎么修改路径？
body:
Start setting native config - this may take a few secondsError: ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '/Users/chenzhidong/project.Lg5/weexSource/CaodandeWeex/caodanWeex/platforms/ios/WeexDemo/WeexDemo-Info.plist'
因为我把WeexDemo等文件放到了ios/playground下，所以现在WeexDemo-Info.plist路径为ios/playground /WeexDemo/WeexDemo-Info.plist
然后执行地weex run ios时就提示找到不到WeexDemo-Info.plist，不移动文件(夹)目录的情况下怎么在weex run ios时指定到新的文件路径呢？
请指教！谢谢！

title: NA
body: @byczd weex-toolkit 中创建的项目为demo项目，用于前端开发者快速进行代码预览，需要你使用命令行或配置文件的方式去更改项目配置，否则对应的手动修改将会导致功能不可用，目前开放的配置项比较少，你可以通过根目录下的`ios.config.json`查看，建议通过你们的客户端同学搭建自己的app进行修改。

title: [Android] x86的cpu无法加载页面。WeexSDK的x86模式缺少libJavaScriptCore.so,版本号：0.20.0.2
body:
x86的cpu无法加载页面。
查看了下现象：
解压weex_sdk-0.20.0.2的aar之后，在jni目录下，有三个文件夹：
armeabi，armeabi-v7a，x86
其中x86比其他两个文件夹缺少libJavaScriptCore.so和libweexjst.so，这是核心原因。

title: [Android]When the weex 0.20.0 interface is revisible, the interface is re-rendered and refreshed.
body:
Hello weex engineer
At present, after the project upgrades the weex version to 0.20.0, the interface (which is not visible outside the screen area) will be re-rendered as a whole. The previous version of 0.17.0 will not render the entire screen area.
The situation found is that the picture URL will be re-read in the image loading adaptation. How can I modify it without re-rendering, is the v-once attribute a feasible solution?

title: NA
body: Added: I also checked the autoBitmapRecycle tag attribute in the document (<image> is used to display a single image in your interface.), but the interface re-visible image is also reloaded (eg, the application returns to the background, halfway) Minutes back to the program again, the current interface image will re-read the image URL loading), how to solve this problem?

title: NA
body: If `autoBitmapRecycle:false` doesn't solve your question, I think you could rewrite the [imageAdatper](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/29c3c80d3e03fd913716ec803c2244b946521dcf/android/commons/src/main/java/com/alibaba/weex/commons/adapter/ImageAdapter.java) and make a memory cache of the image using Picasso, Fresco or any other image library you like

title: [Android][iOS] [iOS] weex vue, this.$refs.xxx.ref, normal div is normal, but the div in components returns undefined
body:
example:
http://dotwe.org/vue/c49eded544dcd35726296942e9a2081c

when use Weex playground app and click the button, we can see demo1 this.$refs.xxx.ref is undefined.but demo2 have

title: NA
body: I think this issue is about front-end, please have a look @Hanks10100 , thanks

title: NA
body:
**It's an expected behavior.** Please refer to the official document of the `ref` attribute: https://vuejs.org/v2/api/#ref

> The reference will be registered under the parent component’s $refs object. If used on a plain DOM element, the reference will be that element; if used on a child component, the reference will be component instance.

The value of `this.$refs.xxx` depends where the `ref="xxx"` is.

The `ref="demotwo"` is used on the weex element, so it contains the `this.$refs.demotwo.ref`.But the `ref="demo"` is used on the custom component of Vue, so the result of `this.$refs.demo` is a Vue component, not a weex element, it doesn't contains the `this.$refs.demo.ref` property.

title: NA
body: By the way, the `this.$refs.xxx` could be Vue component, DOM element, Weex element, or an array of them, according to where you are using it. Moreover it could be changed at rendering time. In short, **it's platform sensitive and dynamic.** So always check the value before using it.

title: iOS 项目偶发性出现页面切换卡顿
body:
weex页面切换的过程会偶发性出现页面切换动画卡顿， 为此我拍摄了一段视频， 视频地址如下
```
http://demo.seapi.cn:8040/weex/video.mp4
```

为了排除其他原因， 我是刚刚使用 npm 创建了新的 weex project 
npm 的版本号如下 
```
rev-192:awesome-app huguangyu$ npm -v
4.6.1
rev-192:awesome-app huguangyu$ weex -v
   v1.3.11
 - weexpack : v1.0.18
 - weex-debugger : v1.0.5
 - weex-builder : v0.4.0
 - weex-previewer : v1.5.1
```
iOS 工程也是使用 weex platform add ios 最新添加的 

页面的内容也是相当简单  就是你们提供的demo页  加了一个跳转  使用navigator调到另一个页面

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15101170/54810780-ea9bf800-4cc1-11e9-8b2f-a65f7b472625.png)

页面都很简单 ， 没有其他任何东西，就是单存的从一个页面 使用你们提供的navigator 工具跳转到另一个页面

运行在手机上后， 我的操作很简单，  就是不停的点击调整然后返回， 不停的重复 ， 不停的重复，这个时间可能很长， 也可能很快就会出现这个问题， 所以是个概率事件 。 

我把整个项目上传到了github 
```
https://github.com/ErHu1993/Weex-Problem

```
这个问题困扰我很久， 一直不知道该如何解决， 希望能成功反馈到你们开发， 谢谢

title: [Android] arm64-v8a support for requirments of google
body:
Due to the [requirements of google](https://developer.android.com/distribute/best-practices/develop/64-bit), We must support android arm64-v8a before **August 1 2019**. So do you have any plan to support it? 
If you cant support it timely, We will consider remove weex sdk in our app because we cant let our app ban by Google Play.

title: NA
body:
Problems received, I don't think this is a bug. 

Instead, I think this is a feature request, in which cause you should send an email to the [mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list)

I will just close the issue.

title: NA
body: I think you should consider re-opening this. This is indeed a blocker for us. And About React Native,this issue had been started about two years ago. And about seventeen days ago, React Native  had released 0.59.0 version to  solve the 64 bits issue. And i also had sent an email to dev@weex.incubator.apache.org to feedback this issue. Looking forward to your Reply, Thanks.

#2389 

We will solve the problem in the early of June.

Thanks

body:

`
其他代码未动

```
$ weex update @weex-cli/debug
```

title: [Android] List doesn't respond when use keepScrollPosition property where weex version is 0.21.1
body:
## Describe the bug
When we use set keepScrollPosition property of the list, if the property changed twice in very short time, the list may be get frozen and can't be freed. When it happend, users can't operate the list until quit this page.

The reason is that the list may get frozen in wrong condition. See line 734-741 of android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/ui/component/list/BasicListComponent.java.

title: [Android] Get blank page when JS exception raised before batch end.
body:
We get blank page when JS exception raised before batch end.
In android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/ui/WXRenderManager.java, the batch update operations should be saved in different containers between different pages.

title: NA
body: The problem seems solved, thanks for your contribute.

title: [Android]weex的nativie库不支持64位
body:
之前已经有一个[issue](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues/2140)，但是被close了。[这个政策](https://android-developers.googleblog.com/2019/01/get-your-apps-ready-for-64-bit.html)是google强制要求的，2019/08/01开始，每个32位对应的native so库必须有相应的64位，否则无法发布更新

> All new apps and app updates that include native code are required to provide 64-bit versions in addition to 32-bit versions when publishing to Google Play

鉴于时间紧迫，64位支持已经不是一个feature，而是一个未来影响开发者使用的bug了，主要是会在海外开展业务，googleplay发布的app。希望能尽快提供64位的native库

title: NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: There was already an issue before, but it was closed. This policy is google mandatory, starting at 2019/08/01, each 32-bit native so library must have a corresponding 64-bit, otherwise it is not possible to release updates All new apps and app updates that include native code are required to provide 64 -bit versions in addition to 32-bit versions when publishing to Google Play Given the time constraints, 64-bit support is no longer a feature, but a bug that will affect developers in the future, mainly to conduct business overseas, googleplay released App. I hope to provide a 64-bit native library as soon as possible.

Please subscribe [weex mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list) where this issue is already discussed.

FYI: As 64 bit support is in early stage, I can't give you a specified schedule yet. What I can tell you is that we will launch 64 bit support before 1st, August, 2019. Please subscribe [weex mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list), we will announce such features in mailing list. Github issue is only for bug report.

...... ...... ...... ``` 与list组件并列加个float-div，css相关属性如下： ``` .float-div{ opacity: 0; position: absolute; left: 0px; width: 375px; height: 600px; //注意：这里的高度根据你的刷新进度能拉多长决定，自己hold住即可。 } ``` 重点注意： - float-div高度 - float-div 背景颜色与页面保持一致 最后提醒下，会出现这个问题，因为使用了自定义的refresh，如果使用官方提供的indicator，那就不会有问题，我这个解决办法也只是绕过去。

A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!-- Requirements: please go through this checklist before opening a new issue
  - * Review the documentation: https://weex.apache.org/index.html
  - * Search for existing issues: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues
  - * Use the latest Weex release: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases -->

title: 【Android】 After the source code of weex 0.17.0 was upgraded to 0.20.0, the list previously used was not as smooth as the original version
body:
The weex version used in the previous application was 0.17.0, but after the recent upgrade to 0.20.0, the list sliding changed to a carton, and the code did not change. Is there a big difference between the architecture after the upgrade and the previous one? How?

Also, there is transparency in the RGB color value used by border-color in the general style, but there is obvious jagged edges in the rounded corners. Can this be solved?

title: [Android] emoji表情显示不全 0.20.0-rc1
body:
![微信图片_20190417194611](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19701356/56285359-9a417a00-6149-11e9-81e2-c4edac556df3.png)
在输入emoji时，从js传过来的字符少一位，导致最后一个emoji表情显示不出来
比如
输入2个emoji时，第2个显示不出来，
但是紧接着再输入第3个时，第二个就能显示出来了，第三个显示不出来，总是最后一个无法显示

title: [iOS] webSocket demo is connecting all the time, without any error or succes prompts
body:
## Describe the bug
In weex playground APP, the webSocket demo is connecting all the time, without any error or succes prompts.


## To Reproduce
<!-- Steps to reproduce the behavior.  Include a MCVE using http://dotwe.org/vue , crash stacktrace or  share your app project. Please follow the guidelines for providing a MCVE: https://stackoverflow.com/help/mcve -->
Demo: <http://dotwe.org/vue/abdcc5c77ab823a85ec66e4de571ad35>
It is the official webSocket demo of weex from <https://weex.apache.org/docs/modules/websockets.html#onerror>.
The demo works in my PC Chrome browser. But it cannot work in the Weex playground APP in the same WIFI network.
I also tried Taobao APP and Dingding APP. It did not work in them.

## Environment

* Device:  iPhone7
* OS: iOS 12.2
* Weex Playground APP Version: 4.0
* Weex SDK Version: 0.20.0
* JS Framework: 0.29.0
* Build from source : no

## Expected behavior
<!-- A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. -->
When I click the "connect" button, the websocket should be connected. 

## Screenshots
<!-- If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. -->
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8750132/56333787-1aa6c000-61c8-11e9-88ba-95374d3f12f0.png)


## Additional context
<!-- Add any other context about the problem here.-->

title: [In Progress] Weex release 0.24
body:
# Abstract
Hi, developers

I am going to call a release for Weex 0.24. It is still in early stage, one can review or participate the release by subscribing the [mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list).

The release branch is [release/0.24](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/tree/release/0.24)

Thanks for your contribution.

# Progress
- [x] Release script
- [x] 0.24.0-RC1 published
- [x] PPMC Voting for **0.24.0-RC1** failed
- [x] 0.24.0-RC2 published
- [x] PPMC Voting for **0.24.0-RC2** failed
- [x] 0.24.0-RC3 published
- [x] PPMC Voting for **0.24.0-RC3** successed
- [x] IPMC Voting for **0.24.0-RC3**

title: [Android] Inconsistent websocket handling
body:
<!-- Requirements: please go through this checklist before opening a new issue
  - * Review the documentation: https://weex.apache.org/index.html
  - * Search for existing issues: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues
  - * Use the latest Weex release: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases -->


## Bug description
Following works for web, but **not** mobile:

```
const ws = weex.requireModule('webSocket')
ws.WebSocket('ws://echo.websocket.org','');
ws.onopen = function(event) {
  console.log('onopen', event);
}
```

If we pass function as argument instead, if works:

```
ws.onopen(function(event) {
  console.log('onopen', event);
})
```
I found about it, after hours of research, [here](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/e82a37236ce8eeffe49f1bbacc20cbeec70bcd43/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/appfram/websocket/WebSocketModule.java#L87). And [documentation](https://weex.apache.org/docs/modules/websockets.html#onopen) does not say anything about it.
It is critical, if you want to use some websocket JS library, which uses `Websocket` under the hood.

## Expected behavior
I expect API to be consistent across platforms.

title: [Android]Unexpected behavior with android app bundle and dynamic feature from varsion gradle 3.3.0 where weex version is 0.20.0.2@aar
body:
## Describe the bug
1- Enabled Android app bundle with gradle version 3.3 and weex pages stopped working. We could see that the .so files were not getting loaded.
2- Contacted google- they have asked to load SO file by System.load or System.loadlobrary, since they have made changes in compression of .so files. For time being, they have asked to add a temporary fix by adding a flag in gradle **android.bundle.enableUncompressedNativeLibs=false** this thread you can access here [**https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/125164369**](url).
The above URL contains complete details.
3-The weex pages started loaded on gradle 3.3.0 after that 
4-We have enabled dynamic delivery of android features. You can find the details in below links. 
[https://developer.android.com/studio/projects/dynamic-delivery](url)
[https://developer.android.com/guide/app-bundle/playcore](url)

5-In our app, we are trying to add the weex library as a dynamic feature modules and delivery it to users as dynamic download module. In dynamic delivery guideline the so files needed to  by **SplitInstallHelper.loadLibrary(Context context, String libName)**. You can find that from below link. 

[https://developer.android.com/guide/app-bundle/playcore#load_native_libs](url)

6-When we install a fresh version of app, when we try to load the weex page it gives following error.
**onExceptionerrCode -1001 msg degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1**
7- we checked **WXEnvironment.sApplication is not null** and on render it gives above error first time .
8- If we push the update to the existing install app, then weex pages start working and load .js file from assets folder 
Here is repo [https://github.com/prankulg/DynamicDeliveryDemo/](url) checkout branch **weexsdk**

## To Reproduce
<!-- Steps to reproduce the behavior.  Include a MCVE using http://dotwe.org/vue , crash stacktrace or  share your app project. Please follow the guidelines for providing a MCVE: https://stackoverflow.com/help/mcve -->

## Environment

请问只针对于Android和iOS来说, 在<cell>组件使用v-for时 是否有必要写key, 其中的缓存机制是怎样的? 如果可以麻烦告知下相关原理, 感谢

title: NA
body:
我们团队使用weex2年多，偶现 线上页面 元素缺失不展示的问题，列表出现率更高。一直没找到原因，昨天线上遇到一个 离奇的 布局不展示问题，可以能稳定的重现 一个没有被 v-if 控制的布局，居然会受到影响而消失！
我觉得这和之前我们线上偶现的元素不展示问题、DevWhan提到的Android写了key=index 会造成cell数据错误(随机缺少cell)的问题、以及我稳定复现提出的issue，这3者有强烈关系。
ios在0.18未出现，但之前我们用0.1版本时，ios也会偶现部分元素不展示问题。
猜测是 js传递到安卓原生，原生构建虚拟Dom树 至 虚拟DOM树 渲染为 原生布局，这个过程中出了问题，导致元素丢失。
不知道是 构建虚拟Dom树时丢失的？还是render时机丢失的？
麻烦官方人员抽点时间，试试我 issue中的 demo，解释下这种现象的原因。
谢谢了🙏
