title: Need armeabi-v7a, arm64-v8a and x86_64 architectures support in Android Weex SDK
body:
## Describe the bug
Currently, Android Weex SDK doesn’t support armeabi-v7a, arm64-v8a and x86_64 architectures. From August 2019 onwards Google will not allow apps on Playstore which does not have support for these architectures. So we need these architectures to support in Weex SDK.

## Expected behavior
Weex SDK should support x64 architectures eg. armeabi-v7a, arm64-v8a and x86_64.

## Additional context
For more info please check the following link:
https://developer.android.com/distribute/best-practices/develop/64-bit

title: NA
body:
We are working on this issue now, and I think we will solve the problem in the early of June.

Thanks.

title: [Android]Unexpected behavior when I control v-if where weex version is 0.18
body: ## Describe the bug just look the code: when the **data** back from network, **both params** are changing from **Visiable** to **Gone**,which named **is201904** && **isSubscribeWX** for controlling UI。 In my opinion, only the **image** && **the second div** will disappear，and weex always work like this。 To my surprise, `{{currentMonth}}月已收收益(元)` this text will disappear, too !!! I know both use v-if && v-else will **reuse** the layout without a **key** in **Vue**.But I remind Vue will not reuse layout when I only use **v-if**。 I have found two ways to solve / avoid this problem: 1. Set a key for the disappear text.Tell Vue not reuse this text.And text will not be gone . But I don not know why **Weex/Vue** thought this text should be reuse !?? 2. Not change both params at the time.Set one param at the front of another. For example, `setTimeout(()=> this.is201904 = ..., 3000) setTimeout(()=> this.isSubscribeWX = ...., 3000) ` ## To Reproduce ## Environment weex 0.18 all android device behaviour it ios is ok！👌 ## Expected behavior The text which without v-if control will not disappear 。I don not think it is a right behaviour in Android ！ ## Screenshots ## Additional context

title: High availability and continuous integration
body:
# Abstract
The contributors of Weex are mobile developers all round the world, and their code would eventually run on billions of mobile devices, which vary in performance, device model, etc. Even 99.999% availability means that thousands of Weex users got problems. Therefore, it is necessary to build a system to achieve high availability by detecting error, memory leak and etc. at runtime before it got merged into our codebase.

# Goal
We expect candidates participating modern software development and have the opportunity to ship their code to billions of users through our summer school by achieving the goals below:
*  Help to build a user-friendly and high availability continuous integration(CI) environment and trigger the CI build each time a github PR is created or updated.
*  Help to build a runtime C++ memory leak and wild pointer detecting mechanism upon the CI environment.
* Help to build a mobile test infrastructure which provides the ability of Android and iOS UI/interface test upon the CI environment.
* Help to build static code lint system.

# Reference
* Travis CI: https://travis-ci.org/
* ASAN: https://source.android.com/devices/tech/debug/asan.html
* GTest: https://github.com/google/googletest

title: Summer of Code
body:
# Abstract
Welcome to the open source world!If you haven't planned how to spend this summer, come to the Alibaba Summer of Code and coding with us! 💻

Alibaba Summer of Code is a global program focused on engaging students directly into open source software development. Under the guidance of the mentor in the Alibaba open source project, students experience the software development in the real world.Alibaba Summer of code will begin between June 28th and September 20th. Students can use the summer time to participate in the open source project and work with the core members of the project.

# What you can get?
On this exclusive developer journey, students will have the opportunity to:
* Participate in the top projects of the International Open Source Foundation;
* Get a scholarship from Alibaba;
* Obtain an open source contributor certificate;
* Get a fast pass of Alibaba Internship/recruitment;
* Get your code adopted and used by the open source project！

Ref our [github site](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/labels/SoC2019) to see goal of Weex in Alibaba Summer of Code.

# Apply Now
You can Alibaba Summer of Code Projects through: https://page.aliyun.com/form/act1008956472/index.htm

One can discover other available project of Alibaba Summer of Code through the corresponding link：
* [English version](https://developer.aliyun.com/special/summerofcode2019en)

You can contact us [weex's mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list) or the mailbox of summer of code: aliopensource@alibabacloud.com

title: [iOS] In some case WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC not work
body:
## Describe the bug

Some day other team web developer told me a custom weex plugin can't work.
 I notice the method ``get:``works, but method ``get:callback:`` do not work, when web js call this method, weex SDK print log like this:
![11721557915823_ pic](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8111265/57773003-91909380-7749-11e9-8a28-4c055b5d4865.jpg)
That means weex not find the method in this plugin. How can this be? 
So I review the code and found the plugin code as follows:

```
@interface WXLocalCacheModel : NSObject<WXModuleProtocol>
- (void)get:(id)sender;
- (void)get:(id)sender callback:(WXModuleKeepAliveCallback)callback;
@end

@implementation WXLocalCacheModel
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(save:))
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(get:))
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(deleteCache:))
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(save:callback:))
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(get:callback:))
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(deleteCache:callback:))
@end
```

## To Reproduce
All things seem perfect. For a brief explanation, if I try code like follows, method ``get:`` and ``get:callback:`` should be called correctly, just add Enter in each line:
```
@implementation WXLocalCacheModel

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(save:))

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(get:))

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(deleteCache:))

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(save:callback:))

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(get:callback:))

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(deleteCache:callback:))

@end

```
Unbelievable,right?

## Some Explanation
How can I find it? I try to review WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC macro definiton, and this is what I see:
```
#ifndef __WX_DEFINE_H__
#define __WX_DEFINE_H__

#define WX_SDK_VERSION @"0.19.0"

#define WX_CONCAT(a, b)   a ## b

#define WX_CONCAT_WRAPPER(a, b)    WX_CONCAT(a, b)

#define WX_EXPORT_METHOD_INTERNAL(method, token) \
+ (NSString *)WX_CONCAT_WRAPPER(token, __LINE__) { \
    return NSStringFromSelector(method); \
}

#define WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(method) WX_EXPORT_METHOD_INTERNAL(method,wx_export_method_sync_)

```
The ``__LINE__``macro means code line number, this grammar sugar add ``wx_export_method_sync_``, ``__LINE__`` to method behind, weex SDK will try to find method in plugin depend on final method name. 
BUT IS THIS A GOOD DESIGN？
To bind particular method implementation to source code line number? This might lead C macro expansion problem. Holding such doubts, I try to change source code line number in ``WXLocalCacheModel`` such as add Enter, fortunately, it works.
I try to use ``PRINT_MACRO`` print real code after macro expansion to got more information but faild cause ``#`` in macro, I am not good at English, and not good at C language, may be your guys can fix it.
If you need all source code in ``WXLocalCacheModel``, contact me.

## environment
iOS12, Xcode 10.2, weex SDK pod version 0.19.0

===

## 问题描述

前端有一天跑过来跟我讲有一个不常用的插件里的方法不管用了。我看了下代码，问题是``get:``方法会正常调用，``get:callback:``方法没有被调用，同时 weex SDK 会打印类似于下图的信息：
![11721557915823_ pic](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8111265/57773003-91909380-7749-11e9-8a28-4c055b5d4865.jpg)
这信息的意思是 weex 没有找到该插件内对应的方法。(脏话)
这个插件里的代码大概是这样子的：

```
@interface WXLocalCacheModel : NSObject<WXModuleProtocol>
- (void)get:(id)sender;
- (void)get:(id)sender callback:(WXModuleKeepAliveCallback)callback;
@end

@implementation WXLocalCacheModel
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(save:))
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(get:))
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(deleteCache:))
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(save:callback:))
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(get:callback:))
WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(deleteCache:callback:))
@end
```

## 复现
代码看起来中规中矩，毫无问题。为了简略说明，我先贴上能够正常使用的代码：
```
@implementation WXLocalCacheModel

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(save:))

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(get:))

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(deleteCache:))

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(save:callback:))

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(get:callback:))

WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(@selector(deleteCache:callback:))

@end

```
加个回车就好了？真的假的？千真万确（脏话）

## 可能的解释
我先说一下我的思路和排查过程，我先看了``WXDefine.h``里面的宏定义，相关代码如下：
```
#ifndef __WX_DEFINE_H__
#define __WX_DEFINE_H__

#define WX_SDK_VERSION @"0.19.0"

#define WX_CONCAT(a, b)   a ## b

#define WX_CONCAT_WRAPPER(a, b)    WX_CONCAT(a, b)

#define WX_EXPORT_METHOD_INTERNAL(method, token) \
+ (NSString *)WX_CONCAT_WRAPPER(token, __LINE__) { \
    return NSStringFromSelector(method); \
}

#define WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(method) WX_EXPORT_METHOD_INTERNAL(method,wx_export_method_sync_)

```
因为我不会 C 语言，所以查了下资料，发现``__LINE__``这个宏的意思是当前代码的行号，所以
``WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC`` 这个语法糖的意思是将一个固定的字符串``wx_export_method_sync_``与当前这句代码的行号一次拼接到传入的选择子后面，作为这个选择子对应的真正的方法名，在 web js 发起调用的时候，weex SDK 会根据具体参数解析出组件名，方法名，行号进行查找。
理解了这个宏以后，我的第一反应是为什么要将代码的行号与具体的方法实现绑定起来？在源代码里面加入不起作用的代码，例如空方法、注释、回车等会影响到编译后的源码实现，我感觉这是一件很奇怪的事。我知道 C 语言里宏展开很容易出现隐性问题，既然变动行号会影响方法实现，那么我先加个回车试试好了。幸运的是，试了一次就成功了。
我本打算设法打印出把这些宏展开后的对应代码来进一步验证我的猜想，但是因为我不会 C 语言，不知道怎么打印宏展开后的代码，所以。。。
如果你需要这个源文件的全部代码，联系我就好，当然我不保证在你那里能复现，如果还有不信的，我空了录小视频给你看（笑）。


## 环境
iOS12, Xcode 10.2, weex SDK pod version 0.19.0

===

title: NA
body: Thanks for your reporting, we will look into that

title: NA
body:
加不加回车并不影响。这里WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC宏实际是给OC类添加一个特定前缀的方法，至于 __LINE只是为了这些方法selector名字不一致（但是有相同前缀）。这样在初始化weexsdk时，利用oc runtime拿到OC类的所有selectors，然后过滤出带这个前缀的方法们，依次调用这些方法，拿到要注册给前缀的真正接口名称。所以你加回车，也只是这些方法名的行号变了一下，并不影响weexSdk拿到真正要的方法名。只要WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(xxx)这些代码不在 **同一行** 就可以。

到于方法丢失的问题，是weexsdk的多线程问题。参考这个PR进行修改，或升级到最新版本即可。https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/2394

It because I used the `width: 100%; height: 100vh` on the `<web>`. That should be `px`;

title: there is a certain probability that events cannot be triggered automatically on android 9
body:
There is a certain probability that events can not be triggered automatically on android 9.

I use `scroller` component. On android 7, the appear event can be triggered automatically when the page is opened and no manual scoll page.

However,  on android 9, sometimes, the appear event can not be triggered automatically, even if use `scrollToElement` to scroll `scroller`. Only use finger to scroll the `scroller`, the appear event is triggered.

weex sdk 0.18

Has anyone encountered the same problem?

title: NA
body:
1. First upgrade weex to the latest version (0.24.0)
2. Provide a [demo](http://dotwe.org/vue).

I will close your issue and you are welcomed to reopen it when you have a demo.

title: NA
body: 你好，weex支持的appear事件是在可滚动的组件（scroller）里才会被触发，可以参考文档https://weex.apache.org/zh/docs/events/common-events.html#appear。你的例子里没有scroller组件，所以无法触发。

05-30 08:53:20.479 29001-29031/com.xindi.apps E/weex: [WXBridgeManager] invokeInitFramework java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: No implementation found for int com.taobao.weex.bridge.WXBridge.nativeInitFrameworkEnv(java.lang.String, com.taobao.weex.bridge.WXParams, java.lang.String, boolean) (tried Java_com_taobao_weex_bridge_WXBridge_nativeInitFrameworkEnv and Java_com_taobao_weex_bridge_WXBridge_nativeInitFrameworkEnv__Ljava_lang_String_2Lcom_taobao_weex_bridge_WXParams_2Ljava_lang_String_2Z)

title: [IOS] iphoneX及以上机型 当判断机型类型设定wrapper的paddingTop时头部会抖动 weex version is 2.0.0-beta.25
body: 在iphoneⅩ及以上机型里，因为iphone的特殊需要给最外层div设置一个paddingTop，但是这样发现页面头部（包裹的第一个组件）在页面切换时会发生抖动，其他安卓机型及旧款iphone都不会，只出现在iphone的异形屏上

title: NA
body: 最终发现是由于使用了:style="{paddingTop=isIphoneX?30px:10px}"的原因，不要使用:style，使用:class代替，就解决了头部抖动的问题

title: What exactly do users download/install when they use weex? Where does it come from?
body:
This issue is to collect any possible problems regarding where code comes from, where the website links to, who uses the Weex name in what way and similar topics.

# Document
Currently, there are two essential tools listed in the documents and none of them are under ASF:
* [weex-toolkit](https://weex.apache.org/guide/develop/create-a-new-app.html)
* [vue-loader](https://weex.apache.org/guide/use-vue-in-weex.html)

Weex-toolkit is a collection of useful tools, maybe we could find a replacement for it and rewrite the corresponding document. As for vue-loader, I don't think one can build Weex without it.

# Github
The following github repositories may lead confusion, as it's hard for developers to understand whether it is part of Apache Weex or not. If they are not the essential part when using Weex, maybe we should change their name.

* https://github.com/weexteam/weex-vue-render
* https://github.com/weexteam/weex-vue-loader
* https://github.com/weexteam/weex-vue-precompiler
* https://github.com/weexteam/weex-builder
* https://github.com/weexteam/weex-loader

# Host name
The following Host name is also confusing
* http://editor.weex.io

title: NA
body: I will move this to mailing list, please don't discuss questions here, thanks.

title: NA
body:
The problem is solved by donating projects to ASF
* [weex-loader](https://github.com/apache/weex-loader)
* [weex-cli](https://github.com/apache/weex-cli)

title: [Android] load page failed in 5.1.1&5.1, where weex version is 0.24.0
body:
## Describe the bug
If we have an emoji in code,it cannot be loaded properly in 5.1.1&5.1.

## Code
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9446934/59008245-83232c80-885c-11e9-8d6c-2733c1c7a544.png)



## Environment
* Device: vivo Xplay5A
* OS: Android 5.1.1

## Stacktrace
`degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error[WXBridgeManager] `

## Addition

title: NA
body:
The log is pretty straightforward. 

> "/data/data/com.cztech.jdyw/files/libweexcorebk1.so" is 32-bit instead of 64-bit

We are working on 64 bit supporting, but Weex only supports 32 bit now. Ref #2389 to see time schedule of 64 bit supporting. We will announce it in the [mail list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list) as well.

title: [Weex] Is there a bounces property in WebView
body: As mentioned. We'd like to disable the bounce effect in WebView.

title: NA
body:
As mentioned in [document](https://weex.apache.org/docs/components/web.html#summary)

> web is only used as a degraded unconventional scenario and is not recommended for a large number of normal Weex pages.

But if you have a PR to fix the problem, I will be happy to review and merge it.

title: [Android] mounted生命周期钩子函数并不与页面渲染完毕的时机挂钩. weex 0.20.0.2
body:
## Environment
Android 4.4
1280*800 平板设备

## Expected behavior
在mounted钩子函数里弹toast, 观察页面元素的展现与toast的时机, toast应该在页面元素全部展现完毕后出现. 

## Current behavior
实际表现为, 页面元素还未完全渲染出现, toast先弹了.

title: [Android]Why is the error code the same when the error is different where weex version is 0.24.0
body:
## Describe the bug
Because my first language is Chinese, I will use Chinese to describe the problem and use "Google Translate" into English.

在release 0.24.0版本中，[不同的错误使用相同的错误码](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/master/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/common/WXErrorCode.java)，举例如下。
```java
WX_DEGRAD_ERR_INSTANCE_CREATE_FAILED("-1001", "degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error",ErrorType.DEGRAD_ERROR,ErrorGroup.NATIVE)
```
```java
WX_JS_FRAMEWORK_REINIT_SUCCESS("-1001", "js framework reinit success",ErrorType.NATIVE_ERROR,ErrorGroup.NATIVE)
```
这两个都是-1001，但是语义相反，一个是成功，一个是失败
这个问题存在于多个错误码中：-1000、-1001、-1002、-1003、-1004、-1005、-1006、-2299
这样的设计会让人感到困惑。

---

In release 0.24.0, [different errors use the same error code](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/master/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/common/WXErrorCode.java), e.g.
```java
WX_DEGRAD_ERR_INSTANCE_CREATE_FAILED("-1001", "degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error",ErrorType.DEGRAD_ERROR,ErrorGroup.NATIVE)
```
```java
WX_JS_FRAMEWORK_REINIT_SUCCESS("-1001", "js framework reinit success",ErrorType.NATIVE_ERROR,ErrorGroup.NATIVE)
```
Both error codes are -1001, but the semantics are reversed, one is success and the other is failure.
This problem exists in several error codes:-1000, -1001, -1002, -1003, -1004, -1005, -1006, -2299.
This design can be confusing.

title: Particularly anxious... error -1001 white screen  [部分机型白屏异常]
body:
About 10% of our company's users will have an abnormal load, which has always been the case of white screen.

We are very anxious to wait for the new version to solve this problem. If it takes too long, we have to consider giving up the weex framework, because we have about 1000 + terminals and too many people are affected.

And I found many of the same problems on GitHub that seemed to have no solution.
So I really want to know how I should solve it or when the next version will be.

Anxious waiting for the reply from the creative team. Thank you.

weex version: 0.24
this is the error :     reader error -1001 degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1

title: NA
body:
我公司约10%的用户会有异常加载，打开就是白屏的情况，且绝大部分异常的机子都一直一直是白屏（VIVO和OPPO偏多）。其他90%的机子偶尔也会白屏但是重新打开就好了。

我们非常渴望等待新版本来解决这个问题。如果时间太长，我们必须考虑放弃weex框架，因为我们有大约1000多个终端，并且有太多人受到影响。

我在Github上发现了许多同样的问题，但似乎没有解决方案。

所以我真的想知道我应该如何解决它，或者下一个版本什么时候解决。

焦急地等待创意团队的回复。谢谢您。

body:

<cell-slot
        @click="abc(i)"
        case="A"
        :style="{width:750,height:100}"
      >
        <text>- A {{i}} -</text>
      </cell-slot>
      <cell-slot
        case="B"
        @click="abc(i)"
        :style="{width:750,height:100}"
      >
        <text>- B {{i}} -</text>
      </cell-slot>

@click="abc" 弹出层正常,点击弹出层，响应的是弹出层绑定的事件。@click="abc(i)"  加了入参弹出遮罩层就无效了，所有滑动、点击都触发在底部页面，如示例中的 input 、 abc响应事件

body: 明白意思了，这个是因为Android系统事件分发的机制和iOS系统不一样。iOS是通过HitTest分发，Android系统是分发到Child上。问题本身和recycle-list没关系。

title: NA
body:
用普通List，RecycleList的bug后续修复。
http://dotwe.org/vue/443eaf9819c6bf59b22766352223d140

title: NA
body:
> 用普通List，RecycleList的bug后续修复。
> http://dotwe.org/vue/443eaf9819c6bf59b22766352223d140

嗯嗯，普通的list也在使用，但是性能差些。我们先停留在18上吧。感谢您的支持，期待RecycleList的修复使用。

body:

title: Can Weex's other operating system support be merged?
body:
Hello,Guys

We are a Chinese operating system company, because most of our operators are front-end engineers, so we plan to support JavaScript development of applications.

Through our in-depth understanding of the current Weex architecture, we should end up running enough for our operations.

At present, we have a concern that if we expand our support for our operating system based on Weex, can we follow up to the master version?

If it may be rejected, we should expand support for Fork Weex, but we are worried that the follow-up will not be compatible with the Weex ecosystem.

If possible, please give a good suggestion, thank you.


My email address.
email: hanamg@hotmail.com

title: NA
body:
That's an interesting idea. I suggest you use master branch if ever possible and merge your changes to Weex. IMO, forking Weex is not an good idea as I know some company forked their version of Weex privately and it's almost impossible for them to merge back.

You can discuss the detail in [mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list), which is a more appropriate place.

title: NA
body: Thank you for your suggestion, follow-up I will discuss through mailing list

title: [iOS] 当控件带有 position: sticky; 样式的时候，在 DOM 再次变化时 iOS 端会出现穿透问题
body:
```
<scroller>
    <abc event="someEvent">展开</abc>
    <view>
        <bcd style="position: sticky; top: 0; left: 0;"></bcd>
    </view>
</scroller>
```
刚开始展示的时候没问题，sticky 效果起作用，位置正确，但是当点击 “展开” 的时候使 abc 控件增高，那么 bcd 悬停的位置还是之前的位置，导致覆盖在 abc 的上面了，形成穿透的效果；

如果改成：
```
<scroller>
    <abc event="someEvent">展开</abc>
    <bcd style="position: sticky; top: 0; left: 0;"></bcd>
</scroller>
```
这个样子就不会出现问题，这个需要怎么解决？

因为我们这边
```
<view>
        <bcd style="position: sticky; top: 0; left: 0;"></bcd>
    </view>
```
这部分被封装到一个控件中了，就在 iOS 端 DOM 发生变化的时候会有问题，其它端都没有问题。
@acton393 @Hanks10100

> github上，0.20.1的tag已经没了

嗯的，就是希望他们误删的话能加回来，毕竟一直用这个版本，现在强制让升级版本不合理。

title: NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: When is the waterfall version, I can't show the style of the waterfall here?

Let me explain the reason here. Weex is under ASF (Apache Software Foundation), and the Weex community has to follow the rule of ASF, which is every release/tag must be voted before published. As 0.20.1 is never voted in the community, we have to delete the tag.

You can choose `0.20.0`, which is voted and still on Github repo.

If you have other questions, you could ask in the [mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list)

IMO, I don't think ASF will change the rule of release procedure.

title: [iOS]js调用native module方法，在native中刷新UI无效（是主线程）
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Github Issue is only used for bur report and please follow the template to report the bug. 
A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!-- Requirements: please go through this checklist before opening a new issue
  - * Review the documentation: https://weex.apache.org/index.html
  - * Search for existing issues: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues
  - * Use the latest Weex release: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases -->


## Describe the bug
<!-- A clear and concise description of what the bug is. -->
js调用Native Module的方法，在Native 方法中获取主线程并刷新UI 无效

## Environment
<!-- 
* Device: [e.g. iPhoneXs Max]
* OS: [e.g. iOS12.3.1]

## Expected behavior
<!-- A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. -->
`
Native Module:
WX_EXPORT_METHOD(@selector(didScrollToIndex:))
- (void)didScrollToIndex:(NSInteger)index {
      dispatch_async(dispatch_get_main_queue(), ^{
         刷新Native UI... 无效
      }
}

也尝试了
- (NSThread *)targetExecuteThread {
    return [NSThread mainThread];
}
`
是我的代码写的有问题吗？如何解决

title: NA
body:
已解决，这个native页面也是module，回调时，weex会创建一个新的module实例，所以，在被调用方法中拿原来页面中的UI是拿不到的，因为不是一个实例。
解决方案：
1，用通知告诉原页面
2，通过类单例的方式获取到原页面实例

> Question Description: [iOS]js calls native module method, refreshing UI in native is invalid (is the main thread)

It seems the issue is solved, I will just close it.

*If you could describe your question in English, it would save a lot of time for developers to search github issue. As they do not need to search English and Chinese twice.*

title: [Android] 设置parent（垂直布局）属性flex:1时，child就显示不全了
NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: [Android] When the parent (vertical layout) property flex:1 is set, the child is not displayed.

This is a bug, of course. But it may take a really long time to fix as many UI behaviour relies on the layout code. I am glad if you can give us a PR.

I will briefly explain the layout algorithm and the reason of the bug below. There are two computing phase during Weex Layout.
* Phase 1: Calculate `hypotheticalWidth` and `hypotheticalHeight` based on`width`, `height`, border-width`, `padding`, `margin`
* Phase 2: Calculate real `width` and `height` based on `hypotheticalWidth`, `hypotheticalHeight``flex-direcon`, `align-items`, `flex` and any other flexbox related styles.

During phase 1, the width of the text or its parent is unknown, the layout algorithm has no way but assumes it is unlimited, e.g. a single line text.

During phase 2, the width and height of the text is correct, but the height of text's parent is still wrong.

**You got what you see.**

	at com.taobao.weex.dom.WXAttr.putAll(WXAttr.java:443)
	at com.taobao.weex.ui.action.BasicComponentData.addAttr(BasicComponentData.java:78)
	at com.taobao.weex.ui.component.basic.WXBasicComponent.addAttr(WXBasicComponent.java:117)

maybe caused by multi-thread

title: [iOS] WXLog will not disable NSLog in release mode automatically
body:
### Question

If I called ``[WXLog setLogLevel: WXLogLevelAll]`` in somewhere, like ``appdelegate.m``, and just change target scheme build configuration from ``debug`` to ``release``, then there is still print the log to terminal.

### Reason

Changing build configuration to ``debug`` means define ``DEBUG`` macro, but I have not see any condition judgment in ``WXLog.h`` and ``WXLog.m``. Unless user called ``WXLog`` like:

```
#ifdef DEBUG
    [WXLog setLogLevel:WXLogLevelLog];
#endif
```

BUT many users will take it for granted that weex will block log by its self, just like these blog posts:[Weex开发 [iOS]](https://www.jianshu.com/p/e1ba1ffb755a).

### Source Code

WXLog core macro like this:

```
#define WX_LOG(flag, fmt, ...)          \
do {                                    \
    [WXLog devLog:flag                     \
             file:WX_FILENAME              \
             line:__LINE__                 \
           format:(fmt), ## __VA_ARGS__];  \
} while(0)
```

One of Related WXLog core function like this:

```
+ (void)log:(WXLogFlag)flag file:(const char *)fileName line:(NSUInteger)line message:(NSString *)message {
    //other code...

    if ([WXLog logLevel] & flag) {
        NSLog(@"%@", logMessage);
    }
}
```

There is no treatment here. Probably developers have a responsibility to deal with WXLog, but I think at least there should be a description in documentation or somewhere.

===

### 问题描述

如果用户在某处调用了类似``[WXLog setLogLevel: WXLogLevelAll]``的代码，然后只是简单地将
 target 的环境从``debug``模式改为``release``, ``WXLog``类依然会持续打印信息。

### 可能的原因

target 的设置本质上是``DEBUG``宏的定义，我在``WXLog.h``和``WXLog.m``里面没有看到任何关于``DEBUG``的判断。这就意味着，除非用户自己在调用时进行判断：

```
#ifdef DEBUG
    [WXLog setLogLevel:WXLogLevelLog];
#endif
```

不然``weex``自己还是会继续打印日志。但是鉴于``weex``是个有名的大项目，很多用户（例如我）下意识的会认为``weex``里面自己会有判断，就像这些新手教程里面写的一样：[Weex开发 [iOS]](https://www.jianshu.com/p/e1ba1ffb755a).

### 部分源码

``WXLog`` 主要的宏定义：

```
#define WX_LOG(flag, fmt, ...)          \
do {                                    \
    [WXLog devLog:flag                     \
             file:WX_FILENAME              \
             line:__LINE__                 \
           format:(fmt), ## __VA_ARGS__];  \
} while(0)
```

``flag``指代打印级别，``weex``使用同一个系列的另外几个宏来打印日志，最后都会汇集到这里来。

拿出一个类似的``WXLog``类方法实现来看：

```
+ (void)log:(WXLogFlag)flag file:(const char *)fileName line:(NSUInteger)line message:(NSString *)message {
    //other code...

    if ([WXLog logLevel] & flag) {
        NSLog(@"%@", logMessage);
    }
}
```
``other code``主要都是对日志级别的一些判断，我暂时还未发现有涉及对``debug/release``模式的判断和控制。我并不认为框架开发者就应该来处理这种条件编译的问题，交由调用者来控制也完全说得通，但是不是至少可以在头文件注释或者文档里面提醒一下，一般开发都是在``debug``下来跑，``release``就可能直接打包，导致这个问题被略过。

title: WXCycleSliderComponent 在iOS会屏蔽原生的手势左滑返回
body:
## Describe the bug
我在使用WXCycleSliderComponent这个控件的时候，发现在iOS上，左滑功能失效了，最初猜测是开启了弹簧效果，但是即使禁止了弹簧效果，一样也不能左滑。

如果我自己通过原生实现，我会重写scrollerView的一个回调事件，代码如下

- (BOOL)gestureRecognizer:(UIGestureRecognizer *)gestureRecognizer shouldRequireFailureOfGestureRecognizer:(nonnull UIGestureRecognizer *)otherGestureRecognizer {     if ([otherGestureRecognizer isKindOfClass:[UIScreenEdgePanGestureRecognizer class]]) {         return YES;     }     return NO; }

但是看了源码后，发现贵方虽然实现了这个回调，但是没有实现里面的方法，请问有没有可能在下一个版本支持一下。

title: NA
body: 使用到这个组件的场景还是比较多的，比如轮播图，比如切换页面等，只要在这个组件的区域，页面原生的侧滑返回都消失了。

title: NA
body: 我觉得，你直接加个自定义组件继承一下就行。。。

title: [iOS] The PR #2394 does not included in latest release version
body:
related: 
[#2445](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues/2445)
[#2394](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/2394)

The code in ``WXSDKManager.m`` is still old version. 
This issue has appeared many times on my side. 
I can fix it by myself but still hope to be able to solve in the release version.

title: NA
body:
~~That is very strange, as per git blame that line hasn't been changed for 2 years: https://github.com/wqyfavor/incubator-weex/blame/c72dc7fa570d5dcdb2d5f744f096ca12339106f3/ios/sdk/WeexSDK/Sources/Manager/WXSDKManager.m#L50~~

~~But https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/commit/6dee825992ab2b8dc043b1bf82205a66adbec485#diff-ed3a1c92b451e932ba0afa5134c5ddd2L50 clearly shows this line getting added to `master` in the merge commit of #2394~~

~~https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/commits/master?after=fdec2eeaefa9bfca4e46533049f1507a0b1ab9be+104 (commit history of `master`) clearly shows this commit actually happening on `master` (third commit from the bottom).~~

~~Something fishy is going on here or I am confused as hell.~~

title: NA
body: Ok, forget what I wrote above: This was using a different fork of the repo, not Apache Weex!

title: NA
body:
I see the change in `master` https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/fdec2eeaefa9bfca4e46533049f1507a0b1ab9be/ios/sdk/WeexSDK/Sources/Manager/WXSDKManager.m#L50

If with "latest release version" you refer to 0.24.0, then you are correct: That was cut _before_ that PR was merged.

The next release 0.26.0 will include the code changes you refer to.

title: NA
body:
OK, thank you for your contribution! 
BTW, I started tracking some cases about half a month ago and then opened the issue #2445, and found #2394 in the #2445 reply that was closed at 2019.05.07. In the past half a month I have received above 3 reports from my friends. In my opinion, ``_bridgeMgr`` will affect all *weex* plugins, the more noteworthy thing is many iOS developers using *weex* but I haven't found many issue or PR to point it out.

title: NA
[Android] weex 0.24 doesn't reset :active style on <text>
body:
Looks like after upgrade 0.18 to 0.24 I faced a lot of bugs in weex :(

## Describe the bug
Style for `:active` on `<text>` element is not being reset 

## To Reproduce
http://dotwe.org/vue/76185ea0f5176a878ce474bbf66a1053

## Environment
* OS: Android 9
* JS Framework: 0.29.6
* Weex SDK Version: 0.24.0.1
* Build from source: no

## Expected behavior
Style should be reset to it's original state after `click` on `<text>` element

title: NA
body:
Seems, that weex core triggers "update" when element size is changed (please check `width`):
http://dotwe.org/vue/a8a7dc73fcd7db36df64464da29c3902

And there are no updates once you set the same width:
http://dotwe.org/vue/e67b3349e479e0f09b4c1f23367a64cf

So it definitely bug!

title: NA
body: It seems like a bug, we will look into that.

title: [Android] Native can`t print “console log” to java where weex version is 0.26(java)
body: JS 使用 console.log()打印日志时，native层有调用WeexConsoleBinding::printLog()方法，但是执行WeexCore::PrintLog时,代码块：LogBridge* logBridge = WeexCore::WeexCoreManager::Instance()->get_log_bridge();变量logBridge在其进程中不能够获取到实例引用；WeexCoreManager在运行内存中有2个内存引用，看了下weex_js_connnection.cpp是有fork()子进程的，但是console log不能正常输出到java ,而WeexCore render 相关的正常输出；

title: NA
body: I also have this problem! I don't know how to repair it.

title: NA
body:
As there is no JNI environment in subprocess, the C++ -> JAVA message channel will not work without IPC.

However, you can just print log by `console.error` or`console.warn`, `console.info` instead of `console.log` in weex 0.26

We shall make IPC chanel in next version to make `console.log` work as expected.

title: NA
body:
> As there is no JNI environment in subprocess, the C++ -> JAVA message channel will not work without IPC.
> 
> However, you can just print log by `console.error` or`console.warn`, `console.info` instead of `console.log` in weex 0.26
> 
> We shall make IPC chanel in next version to make `console.log` work as expected.

But `console.error`  `console.warn`  `console.info` all doesn't work in weex 0.26 now

title: [iOS] ios sdk build fails on release/0.26
body:
ios sdk build fails on release/0.26:
```
In file included from /tmp/incubator-weex/weex_core/Source/core/parser/dom_wson.cpp:24:
/tmp/incubator-weex/weex_core/Source/android/utils/params_utils.h:23:10: fatal error: 'jni.h' file not found
#include <jni.h>
         ^~~~~~~
1 error generated.

** BUILD FAILED **
```
It is caused by the below:

https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/486648769934be249c3d942081debde841a20325/weex_core/Source/core/parser/dom_wson.cpp#L24

removing it fixes the ios build.

also it seems to not be necessary as it didn't break the android build.

title: NA
body:
As release/0.26 passed two rounds vote and will be published soon, the code on release/0.26 won't be changed.

However, we fixed this issue when merge code into master branch.

title: [Android]border-radius and border-width and border-color error
NA
body:
> Weex may not render as expected if you need a smooth transition between different border-radius or border-width on adjoining sides.

As it's said in the [documentation](https://weex.apache.org/docs/styles/common-styles.html#box-model), this is the issue of Android system itself, and there is not much we can do.

Anyway, I will look into the `border-width` and `border-radius` problem, but this issue may not be fixed. As for `border-color: rgba(0,0,0,.5);`, please don't use alpha, there is nothing we can do to combine alpha, border-width, border-radius in Android View system.

title: [Android] weex 0.26 :active pseudo class list elements issues
body:
## Describe the bug
Invalid class setting when style has `:active` pseudo-class after.

1. When I click element its class "flickers" (all except first one)
2. Also `v-bind:class` sets invalid class for first element in `list`

## To Reproduce
http://dotwe.org/vue/291a43ee2fa873821e897c62fdef1327

**1. element class "flickering"**
1. Click A
2. Click B
3. Click B again ( no background! why?)
4. Click B again ( still background! why?)
5. Click A
6. Click A again (okay)
7. Click A again (so, only first element works well)

**2. invalid class for first element**
1. Click A
2. Click B
3. Press A and move finger to screen border (you should see the same as screenshot below: two elements are "selected")
4. You can click B-D, but first element(A) still "selected" 

## Environment
    OS: Android 9
    Weex SDK Version: 0.26.0 (also weex 0.24 affected)
    Build from source: no

## Expected behavior
1. no flickering when clicking
2. no setting invalid class  for first element in `list`

In weex 0.18 it works well

## Screenshots
Here is invalid class on first element
![Screenshot_2019-07-15-00-48-23-291_com alibaba weex](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/771897/61189757-69b2a300-a69a-11e9-9c53-d0a9136c5019.png)

title: NA
body:
Just for clarity:
> When I click element its class "flickers" (all except first one)

Found that "first" - is initiated state (in example: currentIndex == 0)

if we change currentIndex (to 2, for example), then the same situation will be occurred, but with row "C":

http://dotwe.org/vue/ae2c4e414981e13a33109974db229c67

title: NA
body: It seems like a bug, we will look into it.

body:

  - * Search for existing issues: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues

## Describe the bug
**Android Q** when I set **targetSdkVersion=29** weex can not work well
but **targetSdkVersion=28** weex works OK

## To Reproduce
The same source code behave defferent,I only changed targetSdkVersion

## Environment
* Device: OPPO Reno
* OS: Android Q
* Version 0.26.0
* Build from source [no]


## Expected behavior
May be Permission denied

## Screenshots
<!-- If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. -->

## Additional context
<!-- Add any other context about the problem here.-->

title: NA
body:
If you remain the targetSdkVersion as it is(26) and run it on Android Q device, you will see everything is fine.

Maybe Android Q change their C++ memory permission mechanism, maybe this is a bug of Android Q itself. Either way, Weex won't change targetAPI(neither do you, I think) or any code for this issue before Android Q release. After all, it works well on Android Q emulator.

body:
@nm-cmd Could you please give us a PR? I'd be very happy to review and merge it.

FYI: I just try to upgrade to Android 29, and stuck by this ASHMEM issue.

title: NA
body:
1. Please upgrade to 0.26. Even if it is a bug, there is nothing we can do on such an old version.
2. Provide a demo. We can't fix a bug before reproduce it.

title: NA
body: @YorkShen  We've had this problem too many times.So we updated to version 26.But I don't know if it will be solved.Sometimes some icons or views don't show up, and sometimes lists repeat.This is a very serious problem. Every day, customers complain about the instability of our system and occasionally show a lack of it. They mistakenly think it's a data problem.The trigger probability is estimated to be about 3%, but there is nothing we can do about it.I'm sure if you open a weex-built software for a whole day, it will appear 2-3 times.

title: NA
body: @YorkShen Today, I try to raise our version to 26. I don't know if it can solve this problem. But 26 has a very serious problem. Another friend raised a question: when the page loads, there will be component jump, sometimes from the top, sometimes from the bottom, about 100 ms later, it will jump back to the target location. The performance of the mobile phone is not questioned. Question, and every cell phone can be reproduced

title: [Android]Weex pages in 0.26 sdk version are rendering slower than 0.24 version
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Github Issue is only used for bur report and please follow the template to report the bug. 
A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!-- Requirements: please go through this checklist before opening a new issue
  - * Review the documentation: https://weex.apache.org/index.html
  - * Search for existing issues: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues
  - * Use the latest Weex release: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases -->


## Describe the bug
While upgrading to weex SDK version 0.26, pages rendering speed has become very slow.  This is also impacting events also. In 0.24 version everything was working fine.

## To Reproduce
Just load weex pages with some events and check behaviour. 

## Environment
Weex SDK: 0.26
Platform: Android

## Expected behavior
Pages rendering and event speed should be as fast as render in SDK version 0.24.

 def buildRuntimeApi = project.hasProperty('buildRuntimeApi') ? project.property('buildRuntimeApi') : false
```

then test

2. If this still bothers you and you find a solution, you could give us a PR if you can, I am very happy to talk with you implemenation detail or review you PR in [mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/zh/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#%E9%82%AE%E4%BB%B6%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8).

title: [Android] dlopen("/data/app-lib/com.sdu.didi.psnger-1/libweexcore.so") failed: dlopen failed: cannot locate symbol "strtof" referenced by "libweexcore.so"
body:

weex 0.18.0
weex doesn't work,when i run my app on my device (OPPO Android 4.4.4)

## LOG ##
dlopen("/data/app-lib/com.sdu.didi.psnger-1/libweexcore.so") failed: dlopen failed: cannot locate symbol "strtof" referenced by "libweexcore.so"


## Environment

* Device: [OPPO]
* OS: Android 4.4.4

title: [Android] 新建weex工程，把SDK升级到0.26后，安装app时报错！
body:
错误信息如下图所示：
![E91BC3C1-DA62-45b3-8A13-0109636A4EBD](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41984848/61507490-77f51c00-aa18-11e9-993d-53f1f2117e44.png)

操作步骤：
1.使用weex create命令项目
2.使用weex platform add android创建安卓工程
3.使用android studio修改weex sdk版本号，相关jar包版本如下图所示：
![QQ截图20190719110906](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41984848/61506758-c9e87280-aa15-11e9-98e8-b3ff6d52b34e.png)

title: NA
body:
The log is pretty straightforward, you are missing `ABI`. Add your `ABI` first.

FYI, `weex create` is never part of Apache Weex as it explained in the document, you should not ask question in the right place.

I will just close the issue.

title: NA
body:
@YorkShen 同一个工程，SDK降到0.24版本，就不会弹这个错误！
希望能给个具体的解决方法！谢谢！

title: NA
body: As it's said multiple times, we are not responsible for the CLI `weex create` as it is not part of Apache Weex currently.

title: https problem
body: i found weex can only use http to send data ,Wonder how weex extends the ability to send data by using HTTPS

title: NA
body: If your page is on `https`, then Weex shall send request with `https`. There is no black-magic here.

title: [Android]errorCode =  -1001,  WXBridgeManager.mInit is dangerous
body:
## Describe the bug
can not render page

## Result
when i invoke mWXSDKInstance.render, i got errorCode =  -1001, degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1

there is not .so bug, i debug the code, and found WXBridgeManager.mInit is dangerous,

## lifecycle
init application (here invoke WXSDKEngine.initialize)
init Activity
new WXSDKInstance
registerRenderListener(this)
mWXSDKInstance.render

## Track
WXSDKEngine.initialize() -> doInitInternal -> sm.initScriptsFramework -> msg.sendToTarget 

but, 
mWXSDKInstance.render -> renderInternal ->  WXSDKManager.getInstance().createInstance -> mBridgeManager.createInstance ->  if (!isJSFrameworkInit() && reInitCount == 1 && !WXEnvironment.sDebugServerConnectable) 

then, 
 isJSFrameworkInit return not inited, and mWXSDKInstance.render return errorCode = -1001

this is a bug? 

## Version 0.24

title: Android & IOS  view Repeated show in ListPage
body:
List pages always have overlapping views
And often part of the view cannot display the display blanks
Not necessarily, but it happens many times a day. It's very, very uncomfortable.
I'm using version 0.16 now, and the later version will be white screen when it opens. The latest version 0.26 bugs are too many and the performance is worse.
Is there any solution? Thank you.
@YorkShen

title: [iOS] 用scroller时如果有多个textarea 键盘弹出页面偏移计算会有问题
body:
问题：当使用scroller时，如果页面上的textarea有部分被屏幕挡住，点击这个textarea，当键盘弹起时，整个视图会发生错误的偏移
（When using the scroller, if the textarea on the page is partially blocked by the screen, click on the textarea. When the keyboard pops up, the entire view will be incorrectly offset.）

Reproduce：http://dotwe.org/vue/59469ca271eb4e5551c1ce2d3031cd04

*设备：iPhone XR
*操作系统：IOS12.4
*weex版本：0.24
*从源代码构建:是

title: NA
body: 谢谢您的反馈，该问题已经修复

title: [Android][Dev-tool] Dynamic styles cannot render properly on the label that binds the touch event
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Github Issue is only used for bur report and please follow the template to report the bug. 
A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!-- Requirements: please go through this checklist before opening a new issue
  - * Review the documentation: https://weex.apache.org/index.html
  - * Search for existing issues: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues
  - * Use the latest Weex release: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases -->


## Describe the bug
```
<image
        style="position: absolute"
        :style="{width: imgWidth + 'px', height: imgHeight + 'px'}"
        :src="curImgPath"
        ref="box" class="box"
        @touchstart="handleStart"
        @touchend="handleEnd"
        @touchmove="handleMove"
        @load="onImageLoad">
```
```
handleStart (e) {
    this.touchCount++;
    if (this.touchCount % 2 !== 0) {
        this.touchStartTime = e.timestamp;
    }
},
handleEnd (e) {
      if (this.secondTouchEndTime === 0) {
        this.secondTouchEndTime = e.timestamp;
      } else {
        if (e.timestamp - this.touchStartTime < 1000) {
          this.imgWidth = this.imgWidth * 2;
          this.imgHeight = this.imgHeight * 2;
        }
        this.secondTouchEndTime = 0;
      }

      console.log(this.secondTouchEndTime, '|', e.timestamp, '|', this.firstTouchStartTime, '|', e.timestamp - this.touchStartTime)
    },
```

## To Reproduce
Double click on the image to get the video effect

## Environment
On any android device

## Expected behavior
One double click changes the image size only once.

## Screenshots
[The actual rendering](https://www.yuque.com/docs/share/7530feac-b028-407d-9b10-0c1047877483)

title: [Android][iOS]embed标签Android实现未把activity生命周期的接口如Permission检查回调给NestInstance
body: embed标签Android实现未把Activity生命周期的接口如Permission检查回调给WXNestedInstance，导致在embed中的module或者compoent无法收到回调。修复完善回调接口

body: [Android] webview 引用H5地图定不了位

title: NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: [Android] webview reference H5 map can not be bit

According to [our document](https://weex.apache.org/docs/components/web.html#summary), webview is only for degraded scenario, you should not use webview in normal user case.
> `<web>` is only used as a degraded unconventional scenario and is not recommended for a large number of normal Weex pages.

So, this problem won't be fixed.

title: weex安卓应用的字体类型能不能与手机的字体类型一致
body: H5页面字体应该与系统字体一直，需评估是否可以完成；

title: NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: Can the font type of the weex Android app be the same as the font type of the phone?

First of all, there is no font called system font. If you don't specify a font-family, the fallback/default rule of font is undefined behavior.

So, specify a [font-family](https://weex.apache.org/docs/styles/text-styles.html#font-family) will make your life easier.

Then you can parse the passage, and split it to form object array.  such as  {style: "color:red", text: keyword}, {style: "", text: other_words }.  then you can through v-for to display it.

title: 0.20版本windows打包和mac打包发现apk大小不一致！大佬们什么原因
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37531571/63745959-1f962180-c8d6-11e9-8d56-189251d58eb0.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37531571/63745948-1311c900-c8d6-11e9-895c-64721a418fe9.png)

同样的打包配置，我本地是windows本。服务器是mac本，用gradle assembleRelease命令打包，发现服务器打的apk包里的so库大小比windows大很多。哪位大佬知道？最初我以为是AS3.0自动压缩so导致，当我本地配置了不压缩后，重新打包还是和之前的大小一样大。
 packagingOptions{
       doNotStrip "*/armeabi-v7a/*.so"
    }
另外，我发现自己本地打包时，下面的两个目录的so库大小也不一直。
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37531571/63745849-cded9700-c8d5-11e9-980b-54f8e1b095f0.png)

title: NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: 0.20 version of windows packaging and mac packaging found apk size is inconsistent! What are the reasons for us?

I can't tell you what happened exactly as I am not a committer of NDK, but generally speaking, this problem is caused by stripping. As you can see, the size of many shared libraries are different, not only Weex. Change `/armeabi-v7a/.so` to `/armeabi-v7a/*.so` will give you what you want.

title: [iOS] XCode11打包，iOS13系统手机，使用<text>组件，字体非苹果默认的苹方字体
body:
## Describe the bug
[iOS] XCode11打包，iOS13系统手机，使用<text>组件，字体非苹果默认的苹方字体

## Environment
<!-- 
* Device: iPhone
* OS: iOS13 beta7
* WeexSDK: 0.22.0.6
* 编译器：XCode11

## Expected behavior
使用XCode11编译，运行在iOS13手机上时，weex页面中，使用<text>标签的文字字体默认不显示系统字体。单独设置coretext="false"之后，可以正常显示。
使用XCode10编译或者不是iOS13系统的手机，无此问题。

title: NA
body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> [iOS] XCode11 package, iOS13 system phone, use <text> component, font is not Apple's default apple font

Change it to whatever you want by using [font-family](https://weex.apache.org/docs/styles/text-styles.html#font-family)

title: NA
body:
> 感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。
> 
> > [iOS] XCode11 package, iOS13 system phone, use  component, font is not Apple's default apple font
> 
> Change it to whatever you want by using [font-family](https://weex.apache.org/docs/styles/text-styles.html#font-family)

你好，请问具体怎么设置 font-family 呢？
判断 iOS 原生环境，然后给每个 text 组件都设置一遍 font-family: PingFang; 吗？好像效率很低，还不确定是否能生效，多封装一层组件似乎没必要。
请问推荐的详细解决方案是什么样呢？

Hello, what's the value be setted to `font-family`? 
Check if in the iOS native environment, and set `font-family: PingFang;` to every `<text>` or wrap an component (e.g. `<my-text>`) to replace all `<text>`? It seems ugly, and not sure it'll work.
Would you mind offer an more detail and effective solution?

aos和ios差不多。第一种升级方式是copy sdk源码+依赖文件，手动替换升级。第二种是根据一个非官方维护的cli工具，生成一个“weex”的项目结构，然后更改里面的sdk依赖版本

body:
> 0.26.0版本你们有没有遇到过点击事件突然就不能用了，重新打开APP就又可以用了

不是不能用，而是新旧api不兼容。weex的源码新旧不兼容，导致插件js里面报错了，间接报了weex_js_connect.cpp server died，然后表现出来就是界面卡主了。。。

title: [Android] Unexpected crash when app is in profiler started state where weex version is 0.26.2
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Github Issue is only used for bur report and please follow the template to report the bug. 
A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

## Describe the bug
My app is using weex sdk in source integration. We have used for half of year when the version is 0.21.0, but now we update  weex sdk version to 0.26.2. And when I want to monitor  the memory and cpu in android studio's profiler. The app is crashed. 

## To Reproduce
just open the profiler ,and open a weex page. 

## Environment

* Device: [android sumung galaxy s8 plus and huawei P20]
* Version [0.26.2]
* Build from source [ yes] 



## Additional context
when my app crashed, I just have little crash information:
`A/libc: Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1, fault addr 0x1f in tid 8314 (WeexJSBridgeThr)`

title: NA
body: If the crash only happens during profile, it's probably because the profiler tools. There is nothing I can do with such tools.

title: NA
require callbacks when WXSDKEngine.initialize complete
body:
how to reduce: 
1. init engine in the Applicaiton 
```
        InitConfig config = new InitConfig.Builder()
        WXSDKEngine.initialize(this, config);
``` 
it seems the init method above contains async method call :
```
WXBridgeManager.getInstance().post(new Runnable() {
...
}
```

so the developer do not know when dit the  `WXSDKEngine` really complete init, if you load page  too quick, you just get an error
```
 mWXSDKInstance.renderByUrl(pageName, bundleUrl, null, null, WXRenderStrategy.APPEND_ASYNC);
```
```
E/MainActivity: -1001 degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1
```

title: NA
body:
> degradeToH5

Same error happened to me.
Are u sure the reason is loading weexPage too fast? I have not find the reason now. 
Evevytime I opened my APP, the screen/window was white , and the -1001 errorCode  throwed out.

title: NA
body:
@zsmjhtn 
Yes, i' m sure.  if i post the `renderByUrl` method delay in less than about 1000ms in my situation,  error occured. the template project generated by the CLI works fine because it has a splash sceen with delay

title: NA
NA
body:
> @zsmjhtn
> Yes, i' m sure. if i post the `renderByUrl` method delay in less than about 1000ms in my situation, error occured. the template project generated by the CLI works fine because it has a splash sceen with delay

After review my code. My problem is none of business with delay. We have two tactics:
1.FromLocal: Just like official demo, render byte[] during the delay of Container. 
2.FromServer: Rendering  byte[]  after invoke OKHttp callback successful.
Both ways hold varying degrees of time delay, for WEEXEngine finish  initialization byself。

> 
> ```
>         if (WXSDKEngine.isInitialized()) {
>             Log.d(TAG, "init-->1");
>             mWXSDKInstance.renderByUrl(pageName, mUri.toString(), null, null, WXRenderStrategy.APPEND_ASYNC);
>         } else {
>             Log.d(TAG, "init-->2");
>             Handler handler = new Handler();
>             final long[] delayed = new long[1];

@zsmjhtn Thanks for your contribution.

Could you please give us a PR to fix the problem so that other developers won't suffer from it anymore.

title: 64bit support for x86 arch
body:
Starting August 1, 2019, your apps published on Google Play will need to support 64-bit architectures.
But there are still no x86_64 support.

Do you have any plans to add it?

title: NA
body:
Currently, I can't give you a timeline about supporting `x86-64` as most of users run Apps with `armv8-64` phone instead of `x86-64`.

The main problem here is compiling [JSC](https://github.com/alibaba/weex_js_engine/tree/bridge_branch_mergeTimer) (a dependency of Weex) for x86-64 ABI. So far, no progress. You're welcomed to help us solve the problem.

2. If this still bothers you and you find a solution, you could give us a PR if you can, I am very happy to talk with you implemenation detail or review you PR in [mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/zh/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#%E9%82%AE%E4%BB%B6%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8). 
3. As I have a busy schedule, I may read Github issuse months later, but I check mailing list everyday.

title: Any reason for READ_PHONE_STATE permission?
body:
Why READ_PHONE_STATE permission is there? It appears after https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/2776 merging

https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/6daad9ee33ebd50dba2e01bd3a972b3488ba56ac/android/sdk/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml#L22

title: NA
body:
Get IMEI of user's phone.

As you might observed, `WXEnvironment.getDevId()` is always be invoked no matter you specify `android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE`  or not since very early version of Weex. In some phone, calling `getSystemService(Context.TELEPHONY_SERVICE)).getDeviceId()` in code without corresponding `AndroidManifest` will cause crash. I just updated the Manifest to prevent possible crash.

https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/24a30b31e759343668cfe6b8f3de264dd3f586fe/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/WXEnvironment.java#L404-L405

title: [Android]  The cell/cell-slot in the list/recycle-list component of weex cannot be used with vue :is dynamic component usage, not in the list component is normal
body: ### The cell/cell-slot in the list/recycle-list component of weex cannot be used with vue :is dynamic component usage The cell/cell-slot in the list/recycle-list component of weex cannot be used with vue :is dynamic component usage, while not in the list component is normal ## Environment android ## demo ```xml ``` When i use , it was useful ,but when it change to , it can't work well , i hope someone can explain this situation ### emergency !!!! ### dotwe address http://editor.weex.io/p/Jackhu9018/test_is/commit/c99079b80e64209551c08fae36417767

title: NA
body:
The `:is` property is equal with `v-bind:is` which takes a js variable as its value, not the string literal of component name.

Remove the `:` or binding it with a js variable can solve it.

```html
<component
  is="lm-list-row-test"
  list_data="rowdata">
</component>
```

title: [DISCUSS][Android] Rename packageName from com.taobao.weex to org.apache.weex
body:
As one may pointed out, the Android package name in Weex is `com.taobao.weex`, not `org.apache.weex` .

Therefore, I’d like to proposal a new solution to fix the problem.

1. Package name will be renamed from `com.taobao.weex` to `org.apache.weex` in source code and Apache Source Release as the previous plan.
2. Create a custom gradle-plugin which could rename package back to `com.taobao.weex` at compiling time.
3. Publish two build variants (`weex_sdk` and `weex_sdk_legacy`) each time building connivence library. `weex_sdk` will be compiled using the gradle-plugin mentioned above, while `weex_sdk_legacy` will not.
4. Therefore, classes in `weex_sdk` will be under `org.apache.weex` package, and classes in `weex_sdk_legacy` will be under `com.taobao.weex`.
New users of weex should choose `weex_sdk` and new API, while current users could continue using `weex_sdk_legacy` which provide the same API behavior as now.
5. Finally, we would stop publishing `weex_sdk_legacy` sometime later.

For users, There is a guarantee that the API behavior of `weex_sdk_legacy` is the same as before because the source code after processing of gradle-plugin is the same as before. 

If you have any suggestions in this issue, please join the discussion in [mailing list](https://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/weex-dev/201906.mbox/%3CF313FE2D-DB39-4782-BD9B-38CA59029F02%40gmail.com%3E).

Ref https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/2885 for the working draft.

title: [Android] project can not build on Windows system (0.26)
body:
## Describe the bug
<!-- A clear and concise description of what the bug is. -->
settings.gradle function: updateSubmodule use '**bash**' for Windows system, so it can not work well. maybe you can add like follow:
```java
def updateSubmodule(){
    def command = "git submodule update --init --remote"
    def bash = "bash"
    if(System.properties['os.name'].contains('Windows')) {
        bash = "cmd"
    }
    exec {
        executable bash
        args "-c", command
    }
}
```

## To Reproduce

body:
I knew this exception for a while.

Based on my knowledge, it happens by accident and the reason of this bug is mysterious even to me. 

The best solution we have here is add some `try catch` in `com.taobao.weex.ui.view.listview.adapter.RecyclerViewBaseAdapter.onBindViewHolder`, could you please create PR then I can review your change.

*I am a little busy these days, so please help yourself, then I will review and merge your PR*.

body:
I'd suggest you verify whether it works on branch `release/0.28` and you can build binary from source. If everything works well on `release/0.28`, then perhaps you can wait for that version.

As for the log you printed, it's a Linux SIGSEGV error. There is very little things we could do to make Linux SIGSEGV error more clear.

IDE 搜索log时，需要注意filter规则，不能选 show only selected application。要选择 NO filters

title: [Android] in slider tag, use image tag load image with local protocol，weex version 0.20.0, 0.24.0, 0.26.0
body:
## Describe the bug
code like this:
```html
  <slider style="height:750px">
    <image src="local:///a" style="width:750px;height:750px" />
    <image src="local:///b" style="width:750px;height:750px" />
    <image src="local:///c" style="width:750px;height:750px" />
  </slider>
```
and the drawable-xxhdpi like this:
```
drawable-xxhdpi/a.jpg
drawable-xxhdpi/b.jpg
drawable-xxhdpi/c.jpg
```

then run in virutal device, and tap it a few times, image will be blank

## To Reproduce
1.install last version weex-toolkit
2.create a project
3.add android platform
4.copy code to index.vue
5.execute npm run android 
6.tap image a few times

demo：https://github.com/wmlgl/weex-bug-report

## Environment
1.virutal device
phone： Pxiel
system image: Pie 28 x86 Android 9.0

2. xiaomi 5s plus
os: android 8.0.0

title: [Android] Unsupported localeCompare in chinese
NA
body: For Weex 0.28, It ues a stripped [JavaScript interpreter](https://www.npmjs.com/package/jsc-android/v/245459.0.0), some function may be stripped. You could change the JavaScript interpreter if you could or [check whether the extend arguement is supported](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/localeCompare#Check_browser_support_for_extended_arguments) before you call it.

title: NA
body:
遇到过一样的问题。不好定位，本质是自身代码问题，但就是难以找出问题在哪。
SIG: SIGSEGV的错误，一方面我是通过修改打包的abifliter： armabi 为armabi-v7架构，来避免此问题，至少实现了基本控件可以渲染，这是第一步。
另一方面是，一旦我copy了之前版本的一个正常运行的页面尝试 在新版本weex环境中运行，就会遇到诸如weex_js_connection.cpp:192,server died，SIG: SIGSEGV的错误。
本质上是以前版本能运行的部分代码不能够在新版本运行了，比如我用Vue对象来支持 eventbus 页面内父对子通信。在0.18可以，在0.26就报错，页面渲染失败，注释了此eventbus功能就能渲染正常。
还有很多坑没踩，新版本很蛋疼的一点是，根据日志报错你找不到什么代码 有问题（抑或新版本不支持了），只能一行行的注释自己的旧版本能运行的代码，不停的编译跑起来看效果，才能判断大概是什么问题。
damn it。感觉比刚接入weex时，还要摸着石头过河 - -

body:

body:
android的log级别分为v,d,i,w,e，这些log级别分别可以和console.verbose, console.debug 等映射。

然而`console.log`并无法映射到标准的 android 的 log 级别中。

`-keep class org.apache.weex.** { *; }`

Do u have extended some component by yourself?
For me, not only **-keep class org.apache.weex.** { *; }** which copied from  Weex-Offical-Web, but also add rule **-keep class selfpackage.weexExtend.** { *; }** by myself.

title: Please update the iOS version for weex-playground to weex-sdk 0.28.0
body:
Please update the iOS version for weex-playground to weex-sdk 0.28.0
in Apple AppStore :laughing:
### [weex-playground](https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/weex-playground/id1130862662)

title: NA
body:
Well, There is a historical issue that stopped us doing so.

Weex once owned by Alibaba Group, so did Weex Playground. After dontating to Apache Software Foundation(ASF), it would be a serious violation of ASF's trademark if we continue publishing the playground under the name of Taobao(or Alibaba).

As I'm not an iOS developer, I can't fix this problem by myself. However, if you are iOS developer, you could solve this problem for Weex as ASF owns an Apple account, too. You just need to transfer the ownership of Weex Playground from Taobao to ASF. I have created a [request](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/INFRA-18494) to ASF, but I don't have time fo the following step.

If you're willing to help us solve the problem, please disccus this in [mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/zh/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#%E9%82%AE%E4%BB%B6%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8), I am very happy to assist you solve the problem.

title: NA
body: As it's said in the [documentation](https://weex.apache.org/zh/guide/develop/integrate-to-android-app.html), Weex only supports `x86`, `armeabi-v7a` and `arm64-v8a`. No `armeabi` support.

title: NA
body:
> As it's said in the [documentation](https://weex.apache.org/zh/guide/develop/integrate-to-android-app.html), Weex only supports `x86`, `armeabi-v7a` and `arm64-v8a`. No `armeabi` support.

So , what can i do to deal with armabi ? The previous version has no problem

title: NA
body: Yes, from 0.28, `armabi` is not supported any more, as Google depracted and stopped the support for `armeabi`. There is nothing we can do here.

title: NA
body:
> Yes, from 0.28, `armabi` is not supported any more, as Google depracted and stopped the support for `armeabi`. There is nothing we can do here.

Is there any compatibility scheme ?  I want to update , but this problem have to be settled

title: NA
body:
1. Weex will not provide `armeabi` considering Google's insturction.
2. You could copy files from `armeabi-v7` of `weex` to your app's `lib/armeabi`. This may work, you could give it a try.

title: NA
body:
> 1. Weex will not provide `armeabi` considering Google's insturction.
> 2. You could copy files from `armeabi-v7` of `weex` to your app's `lib/armeabi`. This may work, you could give it a try.

Thanks, i will try it

title: NA

body:
Please don't use `armeabi` anymore, Google stopped supporting it years ago.

Weex only [supports `armeabi-v7a`, `arm64-v8a` and `x86`](https://weex.apache.org/guide/develop/integrate-to-android-app.html) and we don't test Weex on `armeabi` anymore. If there is a confusion about what Weex ABI supports and what don't, you could give us a PR to make the documentation better.

body: First of all, I have to solve this problem in order to supplement the documentation to help people who have encountered such problems. Now, I don't know how to solve them. Can you give me some advice?

title: NA
body:

The current NDK 18 Weex using doesn't support `armeabi`, and I can't make Google to support `armeabi` in the furture release of NDK.

body: All right, I am testing with armeabi-v7a now. I have to replace armeabi with armeabi-v7a, which may be difficult to advance.

body: I can compile armeabi using your source code, but the new jsc does not provide armeabi so, [https://registry.npmjs.org/jsc-android/-/jsc-android-241213.1.0.tgz], so you know Where can I find armeabi libjsc.so?

title: NA
body: I still have a question. Is there any difference between the android-jsc file provided by jsc-android and the android-jsc-intl file? Why is their libjsc.so volume difference? I am using android-jsc libjsc.so to replace android-jsc-intl libjsc.so will have problems? I thought that one of them was a normal version and the other was an international version.

title: NA
body:
* `android-jsc-intl` contains ICU, which support various languages, like Russian, Greek, or other language you may heard.
* `android-jsc` doesn't have that kinds of language support. You can test it for youself, whether the language you need is supported.

For `armeabi` of jsc-android, there is nothing I can do. I think as Google stopped supporting `armeabi`, libraries in Android wil not provide it either, as time goes.

title: NA
body: If you see this and have students who have the same problem. This may be the only way to switch to armeabi-v7a. If any of the students have a good solution, share it, thank you.

body:

> Is this call to the jsc api or the weexCore api?

It will invoke a [C++ API](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/master/weex_core/Source/android/wrap/wx_bridge.cpp#L331) in WeexCore, and you can view all the C++/Java binding in this  [file](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/master/weex_core/Source/base/android/jniprebuild/jniheader/WXBridge_jni.h).

FYI: Have you tried the [Weex Playground](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex-playground/), which also uses the new JSC. I think there may be a configuration problem in your app with the new JSC. Is there a `libjsc.so` file in your App? If not, you should [configure](https://weex.apache.org/download/major_change.html#_0-28) it right.

title: [Android] recycle-list在使用子组件时卡顿掉帧
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Github Issue is only used for bur report and please follow the template to report the bug. 
A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!-- Requirements: please go through this checklist before opening a new issue
  - * Review the documentation: https://weex.apache.org/index.html
  - * Search for existing issues: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues
  - * Use the latest Weex release: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases -->


## Describe the bug
<!-- A clear and concise description of what the bug is. -->
用定义子组件模板的方式使用recycle-list组件，在安卓机型上滚动列表出现卡顿掉帧
## To Reproduce

title: iOS pod update fails because repo url is not well defined
body:
"npm run ios" fails when cloning the pod repo because the repo url is not well defined.
this make it to download the repo every time, that takes much longer than npm command is stated to wait for.

The reason why "pod update" fails is because it tries to clone the repo every time, but url is rejected by GitHub, so the repo is always missing.

Pod repo is defined by default project template in Podfile as git:github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git
but this fails because git does plain calls, not secured (SSL), and GitHub does not allow it.

Solution is described barely in https://github.com/CocoaPods/CocoaPods/issues/2696
when it mentions that url should be like "https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git" (without quotes)

This way the repo is well cloned and it won't try to download it again every time (unless really required!), making the "npm run ios" to execute well.

Additional things to keep in mind: pod update can be really slow if there are huge changes pending to download. It makes sense to run it periodically alone, out of "npm run ios" to minimize timeout issue possibilities.

To reproduce it:
.- install a weex environment from scratch (literally) in Mac
      npm install -g weex-toolkit
      Run the App Store and download Xcode
      Install Command Line Tools for Xcode too
      sudo gem install xcodeproj
      sudo gem install cocoapods
      pod setup
      sudo easy_install pip
      pip install six
      Install JDK 8
      (Android studio was also installed from scratch but it has nothing to do with this issue)

.- make a new easy-simple project
      weex create my-app-name
      weex platform add ios

.- execute "npm run ios"

Environment:
.- MacOS 10.15
.- iPhone 8 Simulator
.- npm 6.12.0
.- node 12.13.0
.- weex-toolkit@2.0.0-beta.31

Well, Weex provides `libweexcore.so` as always. You could check it from the [convience binary of Weex](https://weex.apache.org/download/download.html#_0-28-0).

Weex doesn't provide JavaScript interpreter, and the supproting information is also on the [change log](https://weex.apache.org/download/major_change.html#_0-28).

title: [Android] Incorrect page zoom happend occasionally. 页面偶尔异常缩放
body:
<!--
Thanks for using Weex. Github Issue is only used for bur report and please follow the template to report the bug. 
A good bug report should include the following information:
-->

<!-- Requirements: please go through this checklist before opening a new issue
  - * Review the documentation: https://weex.apache.org/index.html
  - * Search for existing issues: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues
  - * Use the latest Weex release: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases -->


## Describe the bug
<!-- A clear and concise description of what the bug is. -->

Page was zoomed on some user's device.

页面在用户设备上异常缩放。

## To Reproduce
<!-- Steps to reproduce the behavior.  Include a MCVE using http://dotwe.org/vue , crash stacktrace or  share your app project. Please follow the guidelines for providing a MCVE: https://stackoverflow.com/help/mcve -->

普通页面布局，但不同用户反馈会偶然遇到，暂时没有找到必现途径。

Simple page layout, happens occasionally. Reproduce path not found yet.

## Environment
<!-- 
* Device: [e.g. iPhone6]
* OS: [e.g. iOS8.1]
* Version [e.g. 22]
* Build from source [e.g. yes/no] -->

Device: Android
OS: 5
Version: 0.24.0

## Expected behavior
<!-- A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. -->

页面期望效果：

This is what the page shold be:

![WechatIMG6.jpeg](https://i.loli.net/2019/11/17/325KsExP4nb7fGm.jpg)

## Screenshots
<!-- If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. -->

![WechatIMG7.png](https://i.loli.net/2019/11/17/fDsopFWZ1rRMkdy.png)

某些用户的设备上，偶尔会出现上面的异常放大情况，非必现。此时页面被放大到显示不全，无法通过操作缩放回来。

异常缩放时，页面布局（宽高、位置）被放大，但字体大小、边框圆角半径等属性却没有缩放，导致字体与布局不搭，圆形 `<div>` 变成圆角方块。

This incorrect zoom happens on some user's device occasionlly, but not every times. When happend, user can not get full page content, and can not restore the page by guesture.

And you can see, the page layout (width, height and relate postion) was scaled, but `font-size` and `border-radius` was not. Leads to page content mismatch, round `<div>` becomes round corner block.

## Additional context
<!-- Add any other context about the problem here.-->

后续跟进用户反馈再补充。

Follows by user's further report.

title: NA
body:
With the information you provide, it's very likely caused by [viewport](https://weex.apache.org/docs/modules/meta.html). Here is my suggestion:

1. Try to upgrade to Weex 0.28
2. Provide a stable reproducable case.

title: NA
body:
@YorkShen 

> 1. Try to upgrade to Weex 0.28
> 

We tried to upgrade to Weex 0.28.0, but app crashed: 
`dlopen failed: library "/system/lib/libc++_shared.so" needed`

> 2. Provide a stable reproducable case.
> 

We extracted user's `WXEvironment` who meet the problem, and found the `deviceWidth` is 2267 and the `deviceHeight` is 1080.

 That is to say, the page state seem like been rotated to landscape layout, but when user take screenshot, the page is still portrait layout. So there must be something wrong with these two paramaters.

So we found the stable reproducable case:

1. Let your app to be landscape;
2. Enter a Weex page;
3. Rotate your device to portrait;
4. Page rerendered, but not as we expected (`font-size` and `border-radius` recalculated, but `width`/`height` not).

title: NA
body:
I still suggest you upgrade to the Weex 0.28. Even if this is a bug and we fix it, you have to upgrade anyway.

> dlopen failed: library "/system/lib/libc++_shared.so" needed

`libc++_shared.so` is missing in your apk for some reason, and I'm sure `weex.aar` contains the file. You should check your build.gradle of your apk.

title: NA
body:
> I still suggest you upgrade to the Weex 0.28. Even if this is a bug and we fix it, you have to upgrade anyway.
> 
> > dlopen failed: library "/system/lib/libc++_shared.so" needed
> 
> `libc++_shared.so` is missing in your apk for some reason, and I'm sure `weex.aar` contains the file. You should check your build.gradle of your apk.

Upgraded, bug resolved, thank you!

title: NA
body:
Weex 0.28.0 changed the package name: [https://weex.apache.org/download/major_change.html#package-name](https://weex.apache.org/download/major_change.html#package-name)

And we have used BindingX, but it still depending on the old package name, how to fix the conflict between Weex 0.28.0 and BindingX?

title: NA
body:
As it explained in the documentation, there are `sdk` and `sdk_legacy` in 0.28. 

* `org.apache.weex:sdk` is the currently stable package of Weex, where all Java files are under the package of `org.apache.weex`.
* `org.apache.weex:sdk_legacy` is the legacy package of Weex, where all Java files are under the package of `com.taobao.weex`. This artifact may not be maintained in the future, please upgrade to the new package name when it's possible for you.

Read the document carefully, many solutions are in the document, acutally.

title: NA
body: apk 内缺少了 JavaScriptCore.so

title: NA
body: @YorkShen 一起看看为什么少了 jsc 的 so文件

title: NA
body: 参考这个文档https://weex.apache.org/zh/download/major_change.html#_0-28  因为跟apache 组织的要求，0.28的版本改成了 org.apache.weex:sdk 并将现有代码的包名升级为 org.apache.weex，你这边确认一下是否正确

title: NA
body:
> apache.



> 参考这个文档https://weex.apache.org/zh/download/major_change.html#_0-28 因为跟apache 组织的要求，0.28的版本改成了 org.apache.weex:sdk 并将现有代码的包名升级为 org.apache.weex，你这边确认一下是否正确

已经升级好，并且能正常运行项目，只是缺少jsc的so文件，每次打包的apk解压后，没有这个文件，所以不能解析js

title: NA
body: 请阅读[文档](https://weex.apache.org/zh/download/major_change.html#_0-28)，里面介绍了 Weex 为什么选择不内置jsc.so，以及如何将 jsc.so 内置到你的app中而不是 weex 中。

title: NA
body: 问题已经解决，官网里面的执行脚本将 jsc.so 内置到项目的时候，默认路径和自己的静态库路径不一致，导致打包后静态库不完整，所以没能生成jsc.so文件

title: [Android]  globalEvent模块在两个平台实现不一致
body:
#2348  Describe the bug
globalEvent模块在安卓平台实现与iOS不一致

## To Reproduce
我测试的WXApplicationDidBecomeActiveEvent事件，在安卓平台写了两个测试页面，分别使用了这个事件，当A打开B后再返回A时会先调用B的WXApplicationDidBecomeActiveEvent事件，再调用A的事件，WXApplicationWillResignActiveEvent应该也有类型的BUG，我看了下源码感觉实现有问题。

## Environment
* Device: Redmi Note 4X
* OS: Android
* Version: 7.0

## Expected behavior
像iOS平台那样实现，只有在切到后台再返回APP时才响应这个事件，不是页面级的切换响应事件

title: [iOS][Weex Ui][wxc-swipe-action] Swiping the wxc-swipe-action component on the iOS phone did not respond
body:
## Describe the bug
No matter WeexPlayground or our own app, using wxc-swipe-action component on iOS mobile phone, left swipe did not respond

## To Reproduce
After starting the weex project locally, scan the qr code with WeexPlayGround and open the page written with wxc-swipe-action component

## Environment
* App:[WeexPlayground]
* Device: [All iphones]
* OS: [All OS]
* Version [20]
* Build from source [yes]

## Expected behavior
Hopefully, all iphone systems will be able to use this component

## Code
Use the Weex Ui official case code，reference：[wxc-swipe-action](https://apache.github.io/incubator-weex-ui/#/cn/packages/wxc-swipe-action/)

title: NA
body: Our app has been solved by adding BindgingX, but WeexPlayground is not available. It is estimated that the problem is the weex SDK version

body: The component input does not support the style: font-weight, also textarea has the same bug.

body: There is nothing we could do without a [demo](http://dotwe.org/vue).

title: NA
body: The demo : http://dotwe.org/vue/7d2c31eca33007f69911d817315d0a6a

title: NA
body:
According to the [document](https://weex.apache.org/zh/docs/components/input.html), `font-weight` is not supported by `input`.

However, if you like, you could give us a PR for `font-weight` support in `input` by [adding a switch case for input](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/master/android/sdk/src/main/java/org/apache/weex/ui/component/AbstractEditComponent.java#L466).

title: [Android][iOS][Dev-tool] Unexpected behavior when xx where weex version is 0.aa.bb.cc
body:
`weex富文本编辑问题：这边通过html-parse-stringify将html解析出来后，将原有的

标签替换成weex可用的标签，但是挂载过程中出现问题，我这边是这样挂载的 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/21301053/69725018-2ee86d80-1158-11ea-8ff6-b86031e4a07f.png) weex 直接将他解析成html文本 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/21301053/69722343-cbf3d800-1151-11ea-910c-0ad31a8cedbe.png) 请问我这边应该怎么将已替换的标签挂载到已有的元素下？ 对应的dotweDemo：http://dotwe.org/vue/25cd15df5853c3414a82644bfaf68da4

title: NA
body:
weex 的富文本只支持有限的子节点类型，具体可参见[文档](https://weex.apache.org/zh/docs/components/richtext.html#%E6%A0%B7%E5%BC%8F)。

`text` 不是富文本支持的子节点。

title: [Android]在Android端保存图片会在相册产生两张图片
body: 在Android端保存图片的时候会在weex文件下产生一张图片，然后在pictures文件下产生一张一样的图片，weex文件下的图片是原图，pictures下面的图片是压缩过的，如何解决，iOS没事

title: NA
body:
I'm pretty sure about Weex will only [save one file](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/7548ba6214ddfe16455cf03c577941f1dfb1ecdc/android/sdk/src/main/java/org/apache/weex/utils/WXViewToImageUtil.java#L90-L126) to your phone.

As for system gallery problem, I think this is the problem of Android system, and there are many similar issue you search in the internet.

Next time, please provide a [demo](dotwe.org).

body:
